paragraphs.paragraph: 中国超重/肥胖医学营养治疗专家共识(2016年版)

sentences.sentence: 中国超重/肥胖医学营养治疗专家共识(2016年版)
sentences.sentence_en: Expert consensus on medical nutrition therapy for overweight/obesity in China (2016 edition)

paragraphs.paragraph_en: Expert consensus on medical nutrition therapy for overweight/obesity in China (2016 edition)

paragraphs.paragraph: 一、背景

sentences.sentence: 一、背景
sentences.sentence_en: 1. Background

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 1. Background

paragraphs.paragraph: 近二十年来，我国超重/肥胖的患病率逐年增长，呈流行态势。中国健康营养调查(China Health and Nutrition Survey，CHNS)的数据显示，从1993年至2009年的17年间，成年人超重/肥胖的患病率从13.4%增加至26.4%，总体呈线性增长；成年人腹型肥胖的患病率从18.6%增长至37.4%，平均年增长1.1%，显著高于超重/肥胖的增长速度。肥胖是糖尿病、心血管疾病及其他代谢性疾病和肿瘤的潜在危险因素。减重治疗包括生活方式(膳食和体育运动)调整、内科药物及外科手术治疗等多种手段。科学合理的营养治疗联合运动干预仍是目前最有效、最安全的基础治疗。近年来，国际上对肥胖/超重的营养管理已经形成了一些共识。然而，以营养和生活方式干预为核心的肥胖/超重管理必须与特定的地域性饮食习惯及社会文化相适应。为更好地发挥医学营养治疗在肥胖防治中的作用，结合国内外发表的诸多证据和专家的集体智慧，特制定本共识，以便使医学减重更加科学、规范和易于实施。

sentences.sentence: 近二十年来，我国超重/肥胖的患病率逐年增长，呈流行态势。中国健康营养调查(China Health and Nutrition Survey，CHNS)的数据显示，从1993年至2009年的17年间，成年人超重/肥胖的患病率从13.4%增加至26.4%，总体呈线性增长；成年人腹型肥胖的患病率从18.6%增长至37.4%，平均年增长1.1%，显著高于超重/肥胖的增长速度。肥胖是糖尿病、心血管疾病及其他代谢性疾病和肿瘤的潜在危险因素。减重治疗包括生活方式(膳食和体育运动)调整、内科药物及外科手术治疗等多种手段。科学合理的营养治疗联合运动干预仍是目前最有效、最安全的基础治疗。近年来，国际上对肥胖/超重的营养管理已经形成了一些共识。然而，以营养和生活方式干预为核心的肥胖/超重管理必须与特定的地域性饮食习惯及社会文化相适应。为更好地发挥医学营养治疗在肥胖防治中的作用，结合国内外发表的诸多证据和专家的集体智慧，特制定本共识，以便使医学减重更加科学、规范和易于实施。

sentences.sentence_en: In the past two decades, the prevalence of overweight/obesity in my country has increased year by year, showing an epidemic trend. Data from the China Health and Nutrition Survey (CHNS) show that from 1993 to 2009, the prevalence of overweight/obesity in adults increased from 13.4% to 26.4%, with an overall linear growth; the prevalence of abdominal obesity in adults increased from 18.6% to 37.4%, with an average annual growth of 1.1%, significantly higher than the growth rate of overweight/obesity. Obesity is a potential risk factor for diabetes, cardiovascular disease and other metabolic diseases and tumors. Weight loss treatment includes a variety of means such as lifestyle (diet and physical exercise) adjustment, internal medicine and surgical treatment. Scientific and reasonable nutritional therapy combined with exercise intervention is still the most effective and safest basic treatment. In recent years, some consensus has been reached on the nutritional management of obesity/overweight internationally. However, obesity/overweight management with nutrition and lifestyle intervention as the core must be adapted to specific regional dietary habits and social culture. In order to better play the role of medical nutritional therapy in the prevention and treatment of obesity, this consensus has been formulated based on a lot of evidence published at home and abroad and the collective wisdom of experts to make medical weight loss more scientific, standardized and easy to implement.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: In the past two decades, the prevalence of overweight/obesity in my country has increased year by year, showing an epidemic trend. Data from the China Health and Nutrition Survey (CHNS) show that from 1993 to 2009, the prevalence of overweight/obesity in adults increased from 13.4% to 26.4%, with an overall linear growth; the prevalence of abdominal obesity in adults increased from 18.6% to 37.4%, with an average annual growth of 1.1%, significantly higher than the growth rate of overweight/obesity. Obesity is a potential risk factor for diabetes, cardiovascular disease and other metabolic diseases and tumors. Weight loss treatment includes a variety of means such as lifestyle (diet and physical exercise) adjustment, internal medicine and surgical treatment. Scientific and reasonable nutritional therapy combined with exercise intervention is still the most effective and safest basic treatment. In recent years, some consensus has been reached on the nutritional management of obesity/overweight internationally. However, obesity/overweight management with nutrition and lifestyle intervention as the core must be adapted to specific regional dietary habits and social culture. In order to better play the role of medical nutritional therapy in the prevention and treatment of obesity, this consensus has been formulated based on a lot of evidence published at home and abroad and the collective wisdom of experts to make medical weight loss more scientific, standardized and easy to implement.

paragraphs.paragraph: 二、证据分级与推荐意见的形成

sentences.sentence: 二、证据分级与推荐意见的形成
sentences.sentence_en: II. Evidence Grading and Formulation of Recommendations

paragraphs.paragraph_en: II. Evidence Grading and Formulation of Recommendations

paragraphs.paragraph: 在制定本共识的过程中，首先参照世界卫生组织(World Health Organization，WHO)出版的《WHO指南编写手册》和AGREE(Appraisal of Guideline Research and Evaluation) 协作网发表的临床指南编写的方法学原则(表1)，结合中国现况，建立制定本共识的方法学，将2009年更新后的AGREEⅡ协作网推出的指南方法学质量评价标准作为质控标准。2015年9月，成立了超重/肥胖医学营养治疗专家共识(2016)(以下简称“共识”)撰写证据方法学小组，负责起草方法学工作方案，并协助编委会进行证据评价的相关工作。证据级别与推荐意见分级标准的制定见表2。

sentences.sentence: 在制定本共识的过程中，首先参照世界卫生组织(World Health Organization，WHO)出版的《WHO指南编写手册》和AGREE(Appraisal of Guideline Research and Evaluation) 协作网发表的临床指南编写的方法学原则(表1)，结合中国现况，建立制定本共识的方法学，将2009年更新后的AGREEⅡ协作网推出的指南方法学质量评价标准作为质控标准。
sentences.sentence_en: In the process of formulating this consensus, we first referred to the WHO Guideline Writing Manual published by the World Health Organization (WHO) and the methodological principles for clinical guideline writing published by the AGREE (Appraisal of Guideline Research and Evaluation) collaboration network (Table 1). In combination with the current situation in China, we established the methodology for formulating this consensus, and used the guideline methodology quality evaluation standards launched by the AGREE II collaboration network after its update in 2009 as the quality control standards.

sentences.sentence: 2015年9月，成立了超重/肥胖医学营养治疗专家共识(2016)(以下简称“共识”)撰写证据方法学小组，负责起草方法学工作方案，并协助编委会进行证据评价的相关工作。
sentences.sentence_en: In September 2015, an evidence methodology writing group for the Expert Consensus on Medical Nutritional Therapy for Overweight/Obesity (2016) (hereinafter referred to as the "Consensus") was established to draft the methodological work plan and assist the editorial committee in related work on evidence evaluation.

sentences.sentence: 证据级别与推荐意见分级标准的制定见表2。
sentences.sentence_en: The standards for the level of evidence and grading of recommendations are shown in Table 2.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: In the process of formulating this consensus, we first referred to the WHO Guideline Writing Manual published by the World Health Organization (WHO) and the methodological principles for clinical guideline writing published by the AGREE (Appraisal of Guideline Research and Evaluation) Collaboration Network (Table 1), combined with the current situation in China, to establish the methodology for formulating this consensus, and used the guideline methodology quality evaluation standards launched by the AGREE II Collaboration Network in 2009 as the quality control standards. In September 2015, the Evidence Methodology Group for Writing the Expert Consensus on Medical Nutritional Therapy for Overweight/Obesity (2016) (hereinafter referred to as the “Consensus”) was established to draft the methodological work plan and assist the editorial committee in related work on evidence evaluation. The formulation of the evidence level and recommendation grading standards is shown in Table 2.

sentences.sentence_en: 3. Organization of the Consensus Writing Committee

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 3. Organization of the Consensus Writing Committee

paragraphs.paragraph: 由中国医疗保健国际交流促进会营养与代谢管理分会以及中国医师协会营养医师专业委员会、中国营养学会的67位专家组成了本共识编写委员会。所有参与指南编写的人员均基于志愿工作。

sentences.sentence: 由中国医疗保健国际交流促进会营养与代谢管理分会以及中国医师协会营养医师专业委员会、中国营养学会的67位专家组成了本共识编写委员会。
sentences.sentence_en: The consensus writing committee was composed of 67 experts from the Nutrition and Metabolic Management Branch of the China Association for International Exchange and Promotion of Healthcare, the Nutrition Physician Professional Committee of the Chinese Medical Doctor Association, and the Chinese Nutrition Society.

sentences.sentence: 所有参与指南编写的人员均基于志愿工作。
sentences.sentence_en: All those involved in the development of the guidelines worked on a voluntary basis.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: The consensus writing committee is composed of 67 experts from the Nutrition and Metabolic Management Branch of the China Healthcare International Exchange Promotion Association, the Nutrition Physician Professional Committee of the Chinese Medical Doctor Association, and the Chinese Nutrition Society. All personnel involved in the writing of the guidelines are volunteers.

paragraphs.paragraph: 四、目标及愿景

sentences.sentence: 四、目标及愿景
sentences.sentence_en: IV. Goals and Vision

paragraphs.paragraph_en: IV. Goals and Vision

paragraphs.paragraph: 通过“共识”的撰写与发布，期望能提高社会及专业人士对营养干预在代谢性疾病治疗中的重要性认识。并能进一步规范医学营养减重的原则和路径，设立标准化医学营养治疗减重管理工作流程，以便临床营养专业人员及医疗保健人员掌握和使用，更好地为减重者服务。

sentences.sentence: 通过“共识”的撰写与发布，期望能提高社会及专业人士对营养干预在代谢性疾病治疗中的重要性认识。
sentences.sentence_en: Through the writing and publication of the "Consensus", we hope to raise awareness among society and professionals about the importance of nutritional intervention in the treatment of metabolic diseases.

sentences.sentence: 并能进一步规范医学营养减重的原则和路径，设立标准化医学营养治疗减重管理工作流程，以便临床营养专业人员及医疗保健人员掌握和使用，更好地为减重者服务。
sentences.sentence_en: It can also further standardize the principles and paths of medical nutrition weight loss and establish a standardized medical nutrition therapy weight loss management workflow so that clinical nutrition professionals and healthcare personnel can master and use it to better serve those who are trying to lose weight.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: Through the writing and publication of the "consensus", we hope to raise awareness among the public and professionals about the importance of nutritional intervention in the treatment of metabolic diseases. We also hope to further standardize the principles and paths of medical nutrition weight loss and establish a standardized medical nutrition therapy weight loss management workflow so that clinical nutrition professionals and health care personnel can master and use it to better serve those who want to lose weight.

sentences.sentence_en: 5. Common Terms in this Consensus

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 5. Common Terms in this Consensus

paragraphs.paragraph: 1.体质指数(body mass index，BMI)：结合身高和体重用于判断人体超重/肥胖与否和程度的指数，计算公式为体重/身高2(kg/m2)。目前我国成人BMI的切点为：18.5≤BMI<24kg/m2为正常体重范围，24≤BMI<28kg/m2为超重，BMI≥28kg/m2为肥胖。

sentences.sentence: 1.体质指数(body mass index，BMI)：结合身高和体重用于判断人体超重/肥胖与否和程度的指数，计算公式为体重/身高2(kg/m2)。
sentences.sentence_en: 1. Body mass index (BMI): An index that combines height and weight to determine whether a person is overweight or obese and the degree of overweight or obesity. The calculation formula is weight/height2 (kg/m2).

sentences.sentence: 目前我国成人BMI的切点为：18.5≤BMI<24kg/m2为正常体重范围，24≤BMI<28kg/m2为超重，BMI≥28kg/m2为肥胖。
sentences.sentence_en: At present, the cut-off points for BMI in adults in my country are: 18.5≤BMI<24kg/m2 is the normal weight range, 24≤BMI<28kg/m2 is overweight, and BMI≥28kg/m2 is obese.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 1. Body mass index (BMI): An index that combines height and weight to determine whether a person is overweight or obese and the degree of overweight or obesity. The calculation formula is weight/height2 (kg/m2). At present, the cut-off points for BMI for adults in my country are: 18.5≤BMI<24kg/m2 is a normal weight range, 24≤BMI<28kg/m2 is overweight, and BMI≥28kg/m2 is obese.

paragraphs.paragraph: 2.肥胖(obesity)：由于体内脂肪的体积和(或）脂肪细胞数量的增加导致的体重增加，或体脂占体重的百分比异常增高，并在某些局部过多沉积脂肪，通常用BMI进行判定。在本共识中，肥胖的主要定义即基于BMI做出，在一些情况下(如代谢综合征) ，也酌情采纳权威国际学术组织(如WHO、美国糖尿病学会等)推荐的相关诊断指标(如腰围，腰臀比)。

sentences.sentence: 2.肥胖(obesity)：由于体内脂肪的体积和(或）脂肪细胞数量的增加导致的体重增加，或体脂占体重的百分比异常增高，并在某些局部过多沉积脂肪，通常用BMI进行判定。
sentences.sentence_en: 2. Obesity: Weight gain due to an increase in the volume of body fat and/or the number of fat cells, or an abnormally high percentage of body fat to body weight, and excessive fat deposition in certain parts, usually determined by BMI.

sentences.sentence: 在本共识中，肥胖的主要定义即基于BMI做出，在一些情况下(如代谢综合征) ，也酌情采纳权威国际学术组织(如WHO、美国糖尿病学会等)推荐的相关诊断指标(如腰围，腰臀比)。
sentences.sentence_en: In this consensus, the main definition of obesity is based on BMI. In some cases (such as metabolic syndrome), relevant diagnostic indicators (such as waist circumference, waist-to-hip ratio) recommended by authoritative international academic organizations (such as WHO, American Diabetes Association, etc.) are also adopted as appropriate.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 2. Obesity: Weight gain due to an increase in the volume of body fat and/or the number of fat cells, or an abnormally high percentage of body fat to body weight, and excessive fat deposition in certain parts, usually determined by BMI. In this consensus, the main definition of obesity is based on BMI. In some cases (such as metabolic syndrome), relevant diagnostic indicators (such as waist circumference, waist-to-hip ratio) recommended by authoritative international academic organizations (such as WHO, American Diabetes Association, etc.) are also adopted as appropriate.

paragraphs.paragraph: 3.超重(overweight)：介于正常和肥胖间的身体状态。通常以24≤BMI<28kg/m2作为判断标准。

sentences.sentence: 3.超重(overweight)：介于正常和肥胖间的身体状态。
sentences.sentence_en: 3. Overweight: a physical condition between normal and obesity.

sentences.sentence: 通常以24≤BMI<28kg/m2作为判断标准。
sentences.sentence_en: The judgment standard is usually 24≤BMI<28kg/m2.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 3. Overweight: A body condition between normal and obese. Usually 24≤BMI<28kg/m2 is used as the judgment standard.

paragraphs.paragraph: 4.儿童肥胖(childhood obesity)：WHO推荐以身高标准体重法对儿童肥胖进行判定，同等身高、营养良好的儿童体重为标准体重(100%)，±10%标准体重的范围为正常。>I5%为超重，>20%为轻度肥胖，>30%为中度肥胖，>50%为重度肥胖。

sentences.sentence: 4.儿童肥胖(childhood obesity)：WHO推荐以身高标准体重法对儿童肥胖进行判定，同等身高、营养良好的儿童体重为标准体重(100%)，±10%标准体重的范围为正常。
sentences.sentence_en: 4. Childhood obesity: WHO recommends using the height-standard weight method to determine childhood obesity. The weight of children of the same height and good nutrition is the standard weight (100%), and the range of ±10% of the standard weight is normal.

sentences.sentence: >I5%为超重，>20%为轻度肥胖，>30%为中度肥胖，>50%为重度肥胖。
sentences.sentence_en: >15% is overweight, >20% is mildly obese, >30% is moderately obese, and >50% is severely obese.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 4. Childhood obesity: WHO recommends using the height-standard weight method to determine childhood obesity. The weight of children of the same height and good nutrition is the standard weight (100%), and the range of ±10% of the standard weight is normal. >15% is overweight, >20% is mild obesity, >30% is moderate obesity, and >50% is severe obesity.

paragraphs.paragraph: 5.限能量平衡膳食(calorie-restricted diet. CRD)：一类在限制能量摄入的同时保证基本营养需求的膳食模式，其宏量营养素的供能比例应符合平衡膳食的要求。

sentences.sentence: 5.限能量平衡膳食(calorie-restricted diet. CRD)：一类在限制能量摄入的同时保证基本营养需求的膳食模式，其宏量营养素的供能比例应符合平衡膳食的要求。

entities.entity: 限能量平衡膳食(calorie-restricted diet. CRD)

sentences.sentence_en: 5. Calorie-restricted diet (CRD): A dietary pattern that limits energy intake while ensuring basic nutritional needs. The energy supply ratio of macronutrients should meet the requirements of a balanced diet.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 5. Calorie-restricted diet (CRD): A dietary pattern that limits energy intake while ensuring basic nutritional needs. The energy supply ratio of macronutrients should meet the requirements of a balanced diet.

paragraphs.paragraph: 6.低能量膳食(low calorie diet.LCD)：一类在满足蛋白质、维生素、矿物质、膳食纤维和水这五大营养素的基础上，适量减少脂肪和碳水化合物的摄取，将正常自由进食的能量减去30%~50%的膳食模式。通常需要在医生监督下进行。

sentences.sentence: 6.低能量膳食(low calorie diet.LCD)：一类在满足蛋白质、维生素、矿物质、膳食纤维和水这五大营养素的基础上，适量减少脂肪和碳水化合物的摄取，将正常自由进食的能量减去30%~50%的膳食模式。
sentences.sentence_en: 6. Low calorie diet (LCD): A dietary pattern that, while satisfying the five major nutrients of protein, vitamins, minerals, dietary fiber and water, appropriately reduces the intake of fat and carbohydrates, and reduces the energy of normal free food intake by 30% to 50%.

sentences.sentence: 通常需要在医生监督下进行。
sentences.sentence_en: This is usually done under doctor supervision.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 6. Low calorie diet (LCD): A diet that meets the five major nutrients of protein, vitamins, minerals, dietary fiber and water, while appropriately reducing the intake of fat and carbohydrates, and reducing the energy of normal free food by 30% to 50%. It usually needs to be carried out under the supervision of a doctor.

paragraphs.paragraph: 7.极低能量膳食(very-low calorie diet，VLCD)：通常指每日只摄入400-800kcal(1kcal=4.2kJ)能量，主要来自于蛋白质，而脂肪和碳水化合物的摄入受到严格限制。机体处于饥饿状态，因其能引起瘦体重减少、痛风发生风险增加以及电解质平衡紊乱等不良反应并不作推荐。该方法必须在医生严格指导下进行，预防并发症的发生。

sentences.sentence_en: The body is in a state of starvation, which is not recommended because it can cause adverse reactions such as loss of lean body mass, increased risk of gout, and electrolyte imbalance.

sentences.sentence_en: This method must be carried out under the strict guidance of a doctor to prevent the occurrence of complications.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 7. Very-low calorie diet (VLCD): usually refers to daily intake of only 400-800 kcal (1 kcal = 4.2 kJ) of energy, mainly from protein, while the intake of fat and carbohydrates is strictly limited. The body is in a state of starvation, and it is not recommended because it can cause adverse reactions such as loss of lean body mass, increased risk of gout, and electrolyte imbalance. This method must be carried out under the strict guidance of a doctor to prevent complications.

paragraphs.paragraph: 8.高蛋白质膳食(high protein diet，HPD)：高蛋白质膳食是一类每日蛋白质摄入量超过每日总能量的20%或1.5g·kg-1·d-1，但一般不超过每日总能量的30%(或2.0g·kg-1·d-1)的膳食模式。

sentences.sentence: 8.高蛋白质膳食(high protein diet，HPD)：高蛋白质膳食是一类每日蛋白质摄入量超过每日总能量的20%或1.5g·kg-1·d-1，但一般不超过每日总能量的30%(或2.0g·kg-1·d-1)的膳食模式。

entities.entity: 高蛋白质膳食(high protein diet，HPD)

sentences.sentence_en: 8. High protein diet (HPD): A high protein diet is a dietary pattern in which the daily protein intake exceeds 20% of the total daily energy or 1.5 g·kg-1·d-1, but generally does not exceed 30% of the total daily energy (or 2.0 g·kg-1·d-1).

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 8. High protein diet (HPD): A high protein diet is a dietary pattern in which the daily protein intake exceeds 20% of the total daily energy or 1.5 g·kg-1·d-1, but generally does not exceed 30% of the total daily energy (or 2.0 g·kg-1·d-1).

paragraphs.paragraph: 9.轻断食模式(intermittent fasting)：也称间歇式断食，一类采用5+2模式，即1周中5天相对正常进食，其他2天(非连续)则摄取平常的1/4能量(约女性500kcal/d，男性600kcal/d)的膳食模式。

paragraphs.paragraph: 一、肥胖的病理生理

sentences.sentence: 一、肥胖的病理生理
sentences.sentence_en: 1. Pathophysiology of obesity

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 1. Pathophysiology of obesity

paragraphs.paragraph: 众所周知，肥胖的发生常常是由遗传、少动以及摄入过多能量共同导致的结果。从代谢研究角度看则是基于代谢紊乱(metabolic disorders) ，代谢紊乱是肥胖从基因到临床表现的中心环节。肥胖者多存在脂类代谢紊乱，脂肪合成过多，而脂肪水解和脂肪分解氧化无明显异常。血浆甘油三酯、游离脂肪酸和胆固醇一般高于正常水平。应用低能量饮食治疗肥胖症时，血浆酮体增加或酮血症倾向往往低于正常人。随着基因组学研究的快速进展，人们发现在基因多态性上的差异，使得在各年龄层次的人群都有对肥胖更易感者。在上述背景下，加之膳食结构变化后肠道菌群结构发生的适应性变化，使得这类具有遗传易感性者对三大宏量营养素(碳水化合物、蛋白质、脂肪)的应答出现显著差异，进面造成肥胖的发生。

sentences.sentence: 众所周知，肥胖的发生常常是由遗传、少动以及摄入过多能量共同导致的结果。从代谢研究角度看则是基于代谢紊乱(metabolic disorders) ，代谢紊乱是肥胖从基因到临床表现的中心环节。肥胖者多存在脂类代谢紊乱，脂肪合成过多，而脂肪水解和脂肪分解氧化无明显异常。血浆甘油三酯、游离脂肪酸和胆固醇一般高于正常水平。应用低能量饮食治疗肥胖症时，血浆酮体增加或酮血症倾向往往低于正常人。
sentences.sentence_en: As we all know, obesity is often caused by genetics, lack of exercise, and excessive energy intake. From the perspective of metabolic research, it is based on metabolic disorders, which are the central link from genes to clinical manifestations of obesity. Obese people often have lipid metabolism disorders, excessive fat synthesis, and no obvious abnormalities in fat hydrolysis and fat decomposition and oxidation. Plasma triglycerides, free fatty acids, and cholesterol are generally higher than normal levels. When a low-energy diet is used to treat obesity, the increase in plasma ketone bodies or the tendency to ketonemia is often lower than that of normal people.

sentences.sentence: 随着基因组学研究的快速进展，人们发现在基因多态性上的差异，使得在各年龄层次的人群都有对肥胖更易感者。
sentences.sentence_en: With the rapid progress of genomic research, people have discovered that differences in genetic polymorphisms make people of all ages more susceptible to obesity.

sentences.sentence_en: In the above context, coupled with the adaptive changes in the structure of intestinal flora after changes in dietary structure, this group of genetically susceptible people have significant differences in their responses to the three major macronutrients (carbohydrates, protein, and fat), which in turn leads to the occurrence of obesity.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: As we all know, obesity is often caused by genetics, lack of exercise, and excessive energy intake. From the perspective of metabolic research, it is based on metabolic disorders, which are the central link of obesity from genes to clinical manifestations. Obese people often have lipid metabolism disorders, excessive fat synthesis, and no obvious abnormalities in fat hydrolysis and fat decomposition oxidation. Plasma triglycerides, free fatty acids, and cholesterol are generally higher than normal levels. When a low-energy diet is used to treat obesity, the increase in plasma ketone bodies or the tendency to ketonemia is often lower than that of normal people. With the rapid progress of genomic research, people have found that differences in gene polymorphisms make people of all ages more susceptible to obesity. In the above context, coupled with the adaptive changes in the structure of intestinal flora after changes in dietary structure, this type of genetically susceptible people have significant differences in their responses to the three major macronutrients (carbohydrates, proteins, and fats), which further causes the occurrence of obesity.

paragraphs.paragraph: 二、限制能量平衡膳食(calorie restrict dict，CRD)

sentences.sentence: 二、限制能量平衡膳食(calorie restrict dict，CRD)

sentences.sentence_en: 2. Calorie restrict dict (CRD)

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 2. Calorie restrict dict (CRD)

paragraphs.paragraph: (一)背景

sentences.sentence: (一)背景
sentences.sentence_en: 1. Background

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 1. Background

paragraphs.paragraph: CRD对于延长寿命、延迟衰老相关疾病的发生具有明确干预作用。CRD目前主要有三种类型：(1)在目标摄入量基础上按一定比例递减(减少30%-50%)；(2)在目标摄入量基础上每日减少500kcal左右：(3)每日供能1000-1500kcal

sentences.sentence: CRD对于延长寿命、延迟衰老相关疾病的发生具有明确干预作用。
sentences.sentence_en: CRD has a clear intervention effect in prolonging life and delaying the occurrence of aging-related diseases.

sentences.sentence: CRD目前主要有三种类型：(1)在目标摄入量基础上按一定比例递减(减少30%-50%)；(2)在目标摄入量基础上每日减少500kcal左右：(3)每日供能1000-1500kcal
sentences.sentence_en: There are three main types of CRD: (1) a certain percentage reduction based on the target intake (reduction of 30%-50%); (2) a daily reduction of about 500 kcal based on the target intake; (3) a daily energy supply of 1000-1500 kcal

paragraphs.paragraph_en: CRD has a clear intervention effect on prolonging life and delaying the occurrence of aging-related diseases. There are currently three main types of CRD: (1) a certain proportion of reduction based on the target intake (reduction of 30%-50%); (2) a daily reduction of about 500kcal based on the target intake; (3) a daily energy supply of 1000-1500kcal.

paragraphs.paragraph: (二)证据

sentences.sentence: (二)证据
sentences.sentence_en: (II) Evidence

paragraphs.paragraph_en: (II) Evidence

paragraphs.paragraph: Huffman等对超重者进行了6个月CRD干预(能量摄入减少25%)，发现与非CRD相比，CRD组的胰岛素敏感性有明显改善，并认为这是降低体重的原因。Yoshimura等对内脏脂肪面积≥100cm2的成人进行12周CRD(CRD目标：25kcal/kg，基线能量摄入约为30kcal/kg)干预后，有效降低了体重、脂肪组织重量、内脏脂肪面积以及动脉粥样硬化的发生风险。

sentences.sentence: Huffman等对超重者进行了6个月CRD干预(能量摄入减少25%)，发现与非CRD相比，CRD组的胰岛素敏感性有明显改善，并认为这是降低体重的原因。Yoshimura等对内脏脂肪面积≥100cm2的成人进行12周CRD(CRD目标：25kcal/kg，基线能量摄入约为30kcal/kg)干预后，有效降低了体重、脂肪组织重量、内脏脂肪面积以及动脉粥样硬化的发生风险。
sentences.sentence_en: Huffman et al. conducted a 6-month CRD intervention (reduced energy intake by 25%) on overweight people and found that the insulin sensitivity of the CRD group was significantly improved compared with the non-CRD group, and believed that this was the reason for the weight loss. Yoshimura et al. conducted a 12-week CRD intervention (CRD target: 25kcal/kg, baseline energy intake of about 30kcal/kg) on adults with visceral fat area ≥100cm2, which effectively reduced body weight, adipose tissue weight, visceral fat area and the risk of atherosclerosis.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: Huffman et al. conducted a 6-month CRD intervention (reduced energy intake by 25%) on overweight people and found that the insulin sensitivity of the CRD group was significantly improved compared with the non-CRD group, and believed that this was the reason for the weight loss. Yoshimura et al. conducted a 12-week CRD intervention (CRD target: 25kcal/kg, baseline energy intake of about 30kcal/kg) on adults with visceral fat area ≥100cm2, which effectively reduced body weight, adipose tissue weight, visceral fat area and the risk of atherosclerosis.

paragraphs.paragraph: 1.脂肪：多项研究证实CRD的脂肪供能比例应与正常膳食(20%~30%)一致，过低或过高都会导致膳食模式的不平衡。在CRD中补充海鱼或鱼油制剂的研究均报道n-3多不饱和脂肪酸(polyunsaturated fatty acids，n-3PUFA)对肥胖者动脉弹性、收缩压、心率、血甘油三酯及炎症指标等均有明显改善，可增强CRD的减重效果。

sentences.sentence: 1.脂肪：多项研究证实CRD的脂肪供能比例应与正常膳食(20%~30%)一致，过低或过高都会导致膳食模式的不平衡。在CRD中补充海鱼或鱼油制剂的研究均报道n-3多不饱和脂肪酸(polyunsaturated fatty acids，n-3PUFA)对肥胖者动脉弹性、收缩压、心率、血甘油三酯及炎症指标等均有明显改善，可增强CRD的减重效果。
sentences.sentence_en: 1. Fat: Many studies have confirmed that the fat energy supply ratio of CRD should be consistent with that of a normal diet (20%~30%). Too low or too high will lead to an unbalanced dietary pattern. Studies that supplement marine fish or fish oil preparations in CRD have reported that n-3 polyunsaturated fatty acids (n-3PUFA) have significantly improved arterial elasticity, systolic blood pressure, heart rate, blood triglycerides and inflammatory indicators in obese people, and can enhance the weight loss effect of CRD.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 1. Fat: Many studies have confirmed that the fat energy supply ratio of CRD should be consistent with that of a normal diet (20%~30%). Too low or too high will lead to an unbalanced dietary pattern. Studies that supplement marine fish or fish oil preparations in CRD have reported that n-3 polyunsaturated fatty acids (n-3PUFA) have significantly improved arterial elasticity, systolic blood pressure, heart rate, blood triglycerides and inflammatory indicators in obese people, which can enhance the weight loss effect of CRD.

paragraphs.paragraph: 2.蛋白质：由于CRD降低了摄入的总能量，必然导致产热的宏量营养素摄入降低，应适当提高蛋白质供给量比例(1.2~1.5g/kg，或15%~20%)，这样就能在减重过程中维持氮平衡，同时具有降低心血管疾病风险、增加骨矿物质含量等作用。不同来源蛋白质的减重效果可能不同，有研究发现大豆蛋白的减脂作用优于酪蛋白，且其降低血液中总胆固醇和低密度脂蛋白胆固醇的作用也更明显。

sentences.sentence: 2.蛋白质：由于CRD降低了摄入的总能量，必然导致产热的宏量营养素摄入降低，应适当提高蛋白质供给量比例(1.2~1.5g/kg，或15%~20%)，这样就能在减重过程中维持氮平衡，同时具有降低心血管疾病风险、增加骨矿物质含量等作用。
sentences.sentence_en: 2. Protein: Since CRD reduces the total energy intake, it will inevitably lead to a decrease in the intake of heat-producing macronutrients. The protein supply ratio should be appropriately increased (1.2~1.5g/kg, or 15%~20%). This will maintain nitrogen balance during weight loss and at the same time reduce the risk of cardiovascular disease and increase bone mineral content.

sentences.sentence: 不同来源蛋白质的减重效果可能不同，有研究发现大豆蛋白的减脂作用优于酪蛋白，且其降低血液中总胆固醇和低密度脂蛋白胆固醇的作用也更明显。
sentences.sentence_en: The weight loss effects of protein from different sources may be different. Studies have found that soy protein is better than casein in reducing fat, and its effect in lowering total cholesterol and low-density lipoprotein cholesterol in the blood is also more obvious.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 2. Protein: Since CRD reduces the total energy intake, it will inevitably lead to a decrease in the intake of heat-producing macronutrients. The protein supply ratio should be appropriately increased (1.2~1.5g/kg, or 15%~20%), so that nitrogen balance can be maintained during weight loss. It also has the effects of reducing the risk of cardiovascular disease and increasing bone mineral content. The weight loss effect of protein from different sources may be different. Studies have found that soy protein has a better fat-reducing effect than casein, and its effect in reducing total cholesterol and low-density lipoprotein cholesterol in the blood is also more obvious.

paragraphs.paragraph: 3.碳水化合物：根据蛋白质、脂肪的摄入量来确定碳水化合物的供给量(40%~55%)。过高或过低都将导致膳食模式不平衡。碳水化合物的来源应参照《中国居民膳食指南》，以淀粉类复杂碳水化合物为主，保证膳食纤维的摄入量25~30g/d。严格限制简单糖(单糖、双糖)食物或饮料的摄入

sentences.sentence: 3.碳水化合物：根据蛋白质、脂肪的摄入量来确定碳水化合物的供给量(40%~55%)。
sentences.sentence_en: 3. Carbohydrates: Determine the amount of carbohydrates supplied (40%~55%) based on the intake of protein and fat.

sentences.sentence: 过高或过低都将导致膳食模式不平衡。
sentences.sentence_en: Too much or too little will lead to an unbalanced dietary pattern.

sentences.sentence: 碳水化合物的来源应参照《中国居民膳食指南》，以淀粉类复杂碳水化合物为主，保证膳食纤维的摄入量25~30g/d。
sentences.sentence_en: The source of carbohydrates should refer to the "Dietary Guidelines for Chinese Residents", with starchy complex carbohydrates as the main source, ensuring that the dietary fiber intake is 25~30g/d.

The source of carbohydrates should refer to the "Dietary Guidelines for Chinese Residents", mainly starchy complex carbohydrates, and ensure that the intake of dietary fiber is 25~30g/d. Strictly limit the intake of simple sugar (monosaccharides, disaccharides) food or beverages

paragraphs.paragraph: 4.微量营养素：肥胖与某些微量营养素的代谢异常相关，尤其是钙、铁、锌、维生素A、维生素D及叶酸的缺乏。肥胖和膳食减重也可引起骨量丢失。一项Meta分析显示肥胖群体患维生素D缺乏的风险比正常人群高35%，比超重人群高24%。在减重干预的同时补充维生素D和钙可以增强减重效果。

sentences.sentence_en: Obesity and weight loss diets can also cause bone loss.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 4. Micronutrients: Obesity is associated with abnormal metabolism of certain micronutrients, especially deficiencies in calcium, iron, zinc, vitamin A, vitamin D, and folic acid. Obesity and dietary weight loss can also cause bone loss. A meta-analysis showed that the risk of vitamin D deficiency in obese people is 35% higher than that of normal people and 24% higher than that of overweight people. Supplementing vitamin D and calcium while intervening in weight loss can enhance the weight loss effect.

paragraphs.paragraph: CRD除能量摄入限制之外，也对营养均衡提出推荐。近年研究认为采用营养代餐方法能兼顾体重减轻和营养均衡。Wadden等对Look AHEAD研究(纳入5145例肥胖合并糖尿病的患者)进行了后续分析，该后续分析考察了接受食支持和教育以及强化生活方式干预的减重情况。强化生活方式干预，在对患者进行均衡营养模式教育的同时也给以营养代餐作为一种支持措施。总的来说，配合营养代餐的强化生活方式干预比单纯的膳食支持和教育能更有效地降低患者的体重(强化生活方式干预组中37.7%的惠者在干预第一年结束时达到了减重10%的目标，而膳食支持和教育组只有3.3%的患者达到此目标)。

sentences.sentence: CRD除能量摄入限制之外，也对营养均衡提出推荐。
sentences.sentence_en: In addition to energy intake restrictions, CRD also makes recommendations for nutritional balance.

sentences.sentence: 近年研究认为采用营养代餐方法能兼顾体重减轻和营养均衡。Wadden等对Look AHEAD研究(纳入5145例肥胖合并糖尿病的患者)进行了后续分析，该后续分析考察了接受食支持和教育以及强化生活方式干预的减重情况。
sentences.sentence_en: Recent studies have shown that the use of nutritional meal replacement methods can achieve both weight loss and nutritional balance. Wadden et al. conducted a follow-up analysis of the Look AHEAD study (5145 obese patients with diabetes) to examine the weight loss of patients who received dietary support and education and intensive lifestyle intervention.

sentences.sentence: 强化生活方式干预，在对患者进行均衡营养模式教育的同时也给以营养代餐作为一种支持措施。
sentences.sentence_en: Strengthen lifestyle intervention, and provide nutritious meal replacement as a support measure while educating patients on balanced nutrition patterns.

sentences.sentence: 总的来说，配合营养代餐的强化生活方式干预比单纯的膳食支持和教育能更有效地降低患者的体重(强化生活方式干预组中37.7%的惠者在干预第一年结束时达到了减重10%的目标，而膳食支持和教育组只有3.3%的患者达到此目标)。
sentences.sentence_en: In general, intensive lifestyle intervention combined with nutritious meal replacement can reduce patients' weight more effectively than dietary support and education alone (37.7% of the beneficiaries in the intensive lifestyle intervention group achieved the goal of 10% weight loss at the end of the first year of intervention, while only 3.3% of the patients in the dietary support and education group achieved this goal).

paragraphs.paragraph_en: In addition to energy intake restriction, CRD also makes recommendations for balanced nutrition. Recent studies have shown that the use of nutritional meal replacement methods can take into account both weight loss and nutritional balance. Wadden et al. conducted a follow-up analysis of the Look AHEAD study (involving 5145 patients with obesity and diabetes), which examined the weight loss of patients who received dietary support and education and enhanced lifestyle intervention. Enhanced lifestyle intervention, while educating patients on a balanced nutritional model, also provides nutritional meal replacement as a support measure. In general, enhanced lifestyle intervention combined with nutritional meal replacement can reduce patients' weight more effectively than dietary support and education alone (37.7% of beneficiaries in the enhanced lifestyle intervention group achieved the goal of 10% weight loss at the end of the first year of intervention, while only 3.3% of patients in the dietary support and education group achieved this goal).

paragraphs.paragraph: 研究表明，接受高蛋白膳食6个月的肥胖者比接受正常蛋白质饮食者体重下降更明显，1年随诊后高蛋白膳食仍较对照组多降低了10%腹部脂肪。Noakes等证实，采用高蛋白膳食比高碳水化合物膳食的肥胖人群体重下降更多(6.4kg比3.4kg，P=0.035)。当受试者每日允许能量摄入为20kcal/kg时，其蛋白质占总能量的30%，碳水化合物占45%，脂肪占25%，同时补充维生素和钾，12周后体重明显减轻(4.72±4.09)kg，BMI、腰围和腰臀比(WHR)也分别下降(1.87±1.57)kg/m2、(3.73±2.91)cm和(0.017±0.029)。Layman等将健康成年肥胖个体随机分为高蛋白低碳水化合物组(PRO组)和低蛋白高碳水化合物饮食组(CHO组)，4个月后，两组体重减少量虽无明显差别，但是PRO组的机体脂肪(体脂)含量减少更明显；相对于CHO组，PRO组对肥胖者血清中的甘油三酯、高密度脂蛋白胆固醇的改善更明显，并且依从性更高。一项为期2年的实验比较了高蛋白和高碳水化合物饮食在糖尿病超重者的减重效果，结果提示高蛋白膳食可能对存在糖尿病、心血管疾病和代谢综合征风险的患者有帮助。113例中度肥胖患者经过4周的极低能量饮食的减重治疗后，体重降低了5%~10%，而随后6个月采用高蛋白膳食(18%)及正常蛋白饮食(15%)进行体重维持，结果显示高蛋白膳食体重反弹率更低。由于慢性肾病患者可能因高蛋白饮食而增加肾脏血流负荷，建议合并慢性肾病患者应慎重选择高蛋白饮食。

sentences.sentence_en: Studies have shown that obese people who received a high-protein diet for 6 months lost more weight than those who received a normal protein diet. After 1 year of follow-up, the high-protein diet still reduced abdominal fat by 10% more than the control group. Noakes et al. confirmed that obese people who adopted a high-protein diet lost more weight than those who adopted a high-carbohydrate diet (6.4 kg vs. 3.4 kg, P=0.035). When the subjects were allowed to have a daily energy intake of 20 kcal/kg, protein accounted for 30% of the total energy, carbohydrates accounted for 45%, and fat accounted for 25%, and vitamins and potassium were supplemented at the same time, the weight was significantly reduced after 12 weeks (4.72±4.09) kg, and BMI, waist circumference and waist-to-hip ratio (WHR) also decreased by (1.87±1.57) kg/m2, (3.73±2.91) cm and (0.017±0.029), respectively. Layman et al. randomly divided healthy obese adults into a high-protein, low-carbohydrate group (PRO group) and a low-protein, high-carbohydrate diet group (CHO group). After 4 months, there was no significant difference in the amount of weight loss between the two groups, but the body fat (body fat) content of the PRO group decreased more significantly; compared with the CHO group, the PRO group had more significant improvements in triglycerides and high-density lipoprotein cholesterol in the serum of obese people, and had higher compliance. A 2-year experiment compared the weight loss effects of high-protein and high-carbohydrate diets in overweight people with diabetes. The results suggest that a high-protein diet may be helpful for patients at risk of diabetes, cardiovascular disease, and metabolic syndrome. After 4 weeks of weight loss treatment with a very low-energy diet, 113 moderately obese patients lost 5% to 10% of their body weight, and then used a high-protein diet (18%) and a normal protein diet (15%) for 6 months to maintain their weight. The results showed that the high-protein diet had a lower weight rebound rate.

sentences.sentence: 由于慢性肾病患者可能因高蛋白饮食而增加肾脏血流负荷，建议合并慢性肾病患者应慎重选择高蛋白饮食。
sentences.sentence_en: Since a high-protein diet may increase the renal blood flow load in patients with chronic kidney disease, it is recommended that patients with concomitant chronic kidney disease should carefully choose a high-protein diet.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: Studies have shown that obese people who received a high-protein diet for 6 months lost more weight than those who received a normal protein diet. After 1 year of follow-up, the high-protein diet still reduced abdominal fat by 10% more than the control group. Noakes et al. confirmed that obese people who adopted a high-protein diet lost more weight than those who adopted a high-carbohydrate diet (6.4 kg vs. 3.4 kg, P=0.035). When the subjects were allowed to have a daily energy intake of 20 kcal/kg, protein accounted for 30% of the total energy, carbohydrates accounted for 45%, and fat accounted for 25%, and vitamins and potassium were supplemented at the same time, the weight was significantly reduced after 12 weeks (4.72±4.09) kg, and BMI, waist circumference and waist-to-hip ratio (WHR) also decreased by (1.87±1.57) kg/m2, (3.73±2.91) cm and (0.017±0.029), respectively. Layman et al. randomly divided healthy obese adults into a high-protein, low-carbohydrate group (PRO group) and a low-protein, high-carbohydrate diet group (CHO group). After 4 months, there was no significant difference in the amount of weight loss between the two groups, but the body fat (body fat) content of the PRO group decreased more significantly; compared with the CHO group, the PRO group had a more significant improvement in triglycerides and high-density lipoprotein cholesterol in the serum of obese people, and had higher compliance. A 2-year experiment compared the weight loss effects of high-protein and high-carbohydrate diets in overweight people with diabetes. The results suggested that a high-protein diet may be helpful for patients at risk of diabetes, cardiovascular disease, and metabolic syndrome. After 4 weeks of weight loss treatment with a very low-energy diet, 113 moderately obese patients lost 5% to 10% of their body weight. In the following 6 months, a high-protein diet (18%) and a normal protein diet (15%) were used to maintain their weight. The results showed that the high-protein diet had a lower weight rebound rate. Since patients with chronic kidney disease may increase renal blood flow load due to a high-protein diet, it is recommended that patients with combined chronic kidney disease should carefully choose a high-protein diet.

paragraphs.paragraph: 运动对减肥的影响取决于运动方式、强度、时间、频率和总量。2013年美国关于成年人肥胖管理指南推荐，增加有氧运动(如快走)至每周150min以上(每天30min以上，每周的大多数天)；推荐更高水平的身体活动(每周200-300min)，以维持体重下降及防止减重后的体重反弹(长期，1年以上)

entities.entity_en: Increase aerobic exercise (such as brisk walking)

sentences.sentence_en: The 2013 U.S. guidelines for the management of obesity in adults recommend increasing aerobic exercise (such as brisk walking) to more than 150 minutes per week (more than 30 minutes per day, most days of the week); higher levels of physical activity (200-300 minutes per week) are recommended to maintain weight loss and prevent weight rebound after weight loss (long-term, more than 1 year)

paragraphs.paragraph_en: The effect of exercise on weight loss depends on the type, intensity, duration, frequency and total amount of exercise. The 2013 American Guidelines for the Management of Obesity in Adults recommends increasing aerobic exercise (such as brisk walking) to more than 150 minutes per week (more than 30 minutes per day, most days of the week); recommends a higher level of physical activity (200-300 minutes per week) to maintain weight loss and prevent weight rebound after weight loss (long-term, more than 1 year)

sentences.sentence_en: (II) Evidence

paragraphs.paragraph_en: (II) Evidence

paragraphs.paragraph: 1.运动与成年人减肥：一项纳入35个随机对照试验的Meta分析发现，有氧运动对降低内脏脂肪有显著效果(干预时间4周~2年，每次运动20~75min)，而渐进性抗阻运动和有氧结合抗阻运动均无显著效果，建议有氧运动作为降低内脏脂肪的核心运动。另一项Meta分析纳人了741例受试者，其BMI在27.8~33.8kg/m2，运动干预时间为2.5~6.0个月，结果显示有氧运动的减肥效果更明显：抗阻运动对提高瘦体重更有效，与抗阻运动比较，有氧结合抗阻减肥效果更明显。在一项单中心、平行随机对照试验中，比较了4种不同的运动量和运动强度，结果显示与对照组相比，各运动组体重和腰围均显著减少，各组间差异无统计学意义。这项研究表明不同运动量和运动强度对腹型肥胖可能均具有减肥效果。

sentences.sentence: 1.运动与成年人减肥：一项纳入35个随机对照试验的Meta分析发现，有氧运动对降低内脏脂肪有显著效果(干预时间4周~2年，每次运动20~75min)，而渐进性抗阻运动和有氧结合抗阻运动均无显著效果，建议有氧运动作为降低内脏脂肪的核心运动。
sentences.sentence_en: 1. Exercise and weight loss in adults: A meta-analysis of 35 randomized controlled trials found that aerobic exercise has a significant effect on reducing visceral fat (intervention time is 4 weeks to 2 years, each exercise is 20 to 75 minutes), while progressive resistance exercise and aerobic combined with resistance exercise have no significant effect. Aerobic exercise is recommended as the core exercise for reducing visceral fat.

sentences.sentence: 另一项Meta分析纳人了741例受试者，其BMI在27.8~33.8kg/m2，运动干预时间为2.5~6.0个月，结果显示有氧运动的减肥效果更明显：抗阻运动对提高瘦体重更有效，与抗阻运动比较，有氧结合抗阻减肥效果更明显。
sentences.sentence_en: Another meta-analysis included 741 subjects with a BMI of 27.8-33.8 kg/m2 and an exercise intervention time of 2.5-6.0 months. The results showed that aerobic exercise was more effective in increasing lean body mass, and compared with resistance exercise, aerobic exercise combined with resistance exercise was more effective in weight loss.

sentences.sentence: 在一项单中心、平行随机对照试验中，比较了4种不同的运动量和运动强度，结果显示与对照组相比，各运动组体重和腰围均显著减少，各组间差异无统计学意义。
sentences.sentence_en: In a single-center, parallel randomized controlled trial, four different amounts and intensities of exercise were compared. The results showed that compared with the control group, each exercise group had a significant reduction in body weight and waist circumference, with no statistically significant differences between the groups.

sentences.sentence: 这项研究表明不同运动量和运动强度对腹型肥胖可能均具有减肥效果。
sentences.sentence_en: This study suggests that different amounts and intensities of exercise may have a weight-loss effect on abdominal obesity.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 1. Exercise and weight loss in adults: A meta-analysis of 35 randomized controlled trials found that aerobic exercise had a significant effect on reducing visceral fat (intervention time 4 weeks to 2 years, 20 to 75 minutes per exercise), while progressive resistance exercise and aerobic combined with resistance exercise had no significant effect. Aerobic exercise is recommended as the core exercise for reducing visceral fat. Another meta-analysis included 741 subjects with a BMI of 27.8 to 33.8 kg/m2 and an exercise intervention time of 2.5 to 6.0 months. The results showed that aerobic exercise had a more obvious weight loss effect: resistance exercise was more effective in increasing lean body mass, and compared with resistance exercise, aerobic combined with resistance weight loss had a more obvious effect. In a single-center, parallel randomized controlled trial, 4 different exercise amounts and exercise intensities were compared. The results showed that compared with the control group, the weight and waist circumference of each exercise group were significantly reduced, and there was no statistically significant difference between the groups. This study shows that different exercise amounts and exercise intensities may have a weight loss effect on abdominal obesity.

paragraphs.paragraph: 2.运动结合营养干预与减重：一项纳入了3521名受试者的Mela分析，干预时间12-72个月，营养干预方式为降低能量摄入，主要为低脂(≤总能量的30%)、低饱和脂肪酸、增加水果蔬菜和膳食纤维的摄入。运动干预主要是在监督下进行有氧运动和抗阻训练，强度为50%~85%最大心率。结果发现与单纯饮食组或运动组相比，饮食结合运动的减重效果更加显著，同时可以看到在改善人体测量指标方面，营养干预优于运动治疗。Stephens等在2014年对60项Meta分析和23个系统性综述进行了再评价，认为多种干预措施都可以帮助受试者达到减重目标，但其中营养干预研究得出的结论较为一致，即对于减重效果最为明确。而运动干预研究在不同的作者所做的Meta分析中得出的结论则有较大差异。这种结果的异质性与研究者选定的结局评价指标、研究设计存在很大关联。

sentences.sentence: 2.运动结合营养干预与减重：一项纳入了3521名受试者的Mela分析，干预时间12-72个月，营养干预方式为降低能量摄入，主要为低脂(≤总能量的30%)、低饱和脂肪酸、增加水果蔬菜和膳食纤维的摄入。
sentences.sentence_en: 2. Exercise combined with nutritional intervention and weight loss: A Mela analysis included 3521 subjects with an intervention period of 12-72 months. The nutritional intervention method was to reduce energy intake, mainly low fat (≤30% of total energy), low saturated fatty acids, and increase the intake of fruits, vegetables and dietary fiber.

sentences.sentence: 运动干预主要是在监督下进行有氧运动和抗阻训练，强度为50%~85%最大心率。
sentences.sentence_en: Exercise intervention mainly consists of supervised aerobic exercise and resistance training at an intensity of 50% to 85% of maximum heart rate.

sentences.sentence: 结果发现与单纯饮食组或运动组相比，饮食结合运动的减重效果更加显著，同时可以看到在改善人体测量指标方面，营养干预优于运动治疗。
sentences.sentence_en: The results showed that compared with the diet group or exercise group alone, the weight loss effect of diet combined with exercise was more significant. At the same time, it can be seen that nutritional intervention is better than exercise therapy in improving anthropometric indicators.

sentences.sentence: Stephens等在2014年对60项Meta分析和23个系统性综述进行了再评价，认为多种干预措施都可以帮助受试者达到减重目标，但其中营养干预研究得出的结论较为一致，即对于减重效果最为明确。
sentences.sentence_en: Stephens et al. re-evaluated 60 meta-analyses and 23 systematic reviews in 2014 and concluded that a variety of intervention measures can help subjects achieve their weight loss goals, but the conclusions drawn from nutritional intervention studies were more consistent, that is, the effect on weight loss was the most clear.

sentences.sentence: 而运动干预研究在不同的作者所做的Meta分析中得出的结论则有较大差异。
sentences.sentence_en: However, the conclusions drawn from meta-analyses of exercise intervention studies conducted by different authors vary greatly.

sentences.sentence: 这种结果的异质性与研究者选定的结局评价指标、研究设计存在很大关联。
sentences.sentence_en: This heterogeneity of results is closely related to the outcome evaluation indicators and research designs selected by researchers.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 2. Exercise combined with nutritional intervention and weight loss: A Mela analysis included 3521 subjects, with an intervention period of 12-72 months. The nutritional intervention method was to reduce energy intake, mainly low fat (≤30% of total energy), low saturated fatty acids, and increase the intake of fruits, vegetables and dietary fiber. Exercise intervention mainly involves aerobic exercise and resistance training under supervision, with an intensity of 50%~85% of the maximum heart rate. The results showed that compared with the diet group or exercise group alone, the weight loss effect of diet combined with exercise was more significant. At the same time, it can be seen that nutritional intervention is better than exercise therapy in improving anthropometric indicators. Stephens et al. re-evaluated 60 meta-analyses and 23 systematic reviews in 2014, and believed that a variety of intervention measures can help subjects achieve weight loss goals, but the conclusions drawn from nutritional intervention studies are relatively consistent, that is, the effect on weight loss is the clearest. However, the conclusions drawn from exercise intervention studies in meta-analyses conducted by different authors are quite different. This heterogeneity of results is greatly related to the outcome evaluation indicators and research designs selected by the researchers.

paragraphs.paragraph: 3.运动治疗与儿童减肥：一筒纳入了2项Meta分析的系统性综述，均显示体脂率有显著性降低。而其他肥胖指标(BMI、体重、中心性肥胖)则没有显著性差异。一篇纳入40项研究的系统性综述和Meta分析，评价了抗阻训练对肥胖儿童力量、体成分等的影响，显示抗阻运动对体成分有极小影响，且亚组分析显示运动量越大、年龄越小、随机对照设计产生更显著效果。一项纳入15个随机对照试验的系统性综述和Meta分析，比较仅饮食干预与饮食结合运动或仅运动干预对超重儿童减重和降低代谢风险的效果，结果显示，短期干预中仅饮食和饮食结合运动均产生了减重和代谢指标改善的效果，而长期干预显示饮食结合运动干预可以显著改善高密度脂蛋白胆固醇和空腹血糖、空腹胰岛素水平。

sentences.sentence_en: 3. Exercise therapy and weight loss in children: A systematic review that included 2 meta-analyses showed that body fat percentage was significantly reduced. However, there was no significant difference in other obesity indicators (BMI, weight, central obesity). A systematic review and meta-analysis that included 40 studies evaluated the effects of resistance training on strength, body composition, etc. in obese children, showing that resistance exercise had minimal effect on body composition, and subgroup analysis showed that the greater the amount of exercise, the younger the age, and the randomized controlled design produced more significant effects. A systematic review and meta-analysis that included 15 randomized controlled trials compared the effects of diet intervention alone with diet combined with exercise or exercise intervention alone on weight loss and reducing metabolic risks in overweight children. The results showed that in short-term interventions, both diet alone and diet combined with exercise produced weight loss and improvement of metabolic indicators, while long-term interventions showed that diet combined with exercise interventions can significantly improve high-density lipoprotein cholesterol and fasting blood glucose and fasting insulin levels.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 3. Exercise therapy and weight loss in children: A systematic review that included 2 meta-analyses showed that body fat percentage was significantly reduced. However, there was no significant difference in other obesity indicators (BMI, weight, central obesity). A systematic review and meta-analysis that included 40 studies evaluated the effects of resistance training on strength, body composition, etc. in obese children, showing that resistance exercise had minimal effect on body composition, and subgroup analysis showed that the greater the amount of exercise, the younger the age, and the randomized controlled design produced more significant effects. A systematic review and meta-analysis that included 15 randomized controlled trials compared the effects of diet intervention alone with diet combined with exercise or exercise intervention alone on weight loss and reducing metabolic risks in overweight children. The results showed that in short-term interventions, both diet alone and diet combined with exercise produced weight loss and improvement of metabolic indicators, while long-term interventions showed that diet combined with exercise interventions can significantly improve high-density lipoprotein cholesterol and fasting blood glucose and fasting insulin levels.

paragraphs.paragraph: 4.运动治疗与孕期体重管理：一项纳人910名产后女性的系统性综述发现，单纯坚持有氧运动(步行)者与对照组相比体重变化没有显著差异。而饮食干预或饮食结合运动干预者与对照组相比体重显著降低，干预措施对哺乳行为并无消极影响。另一项合并了11个随机对照试验的Meta分析纳入769名产后女性，干预10-52周，结果显示最有效的减重方式是设定客观目标的运动干预，如心率监测或计步器的使用，表明生活方式干预对产后女性的减重是有益的，运动结合强化饮食干预并设定客观目标是最有效的干预方式。

sentences.sentence_en: Another meta-analysis that combined 11 randomized controlled trials included 769 postpartum women with interventions for 10-52 weeks. The results showed that the most effective way to lose weight was exercise intervention with objective goals, such as the use of heart rate monitoring or pedometers. This shows that lifestyle intervention is beneficial for weight loss in postpartum women, and exercise combined with intensive dietary intervention and setting objective goals is the most effective intervention method.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 4. Exercise therapy and weight management during pregnancy: A systematic review of 910 postpartum women found that there was no significant difference in weight change between those who simply adhered to aerobic exercise (walking) and the control group. However, those who received dietary intervention or diet combined with exercise intervention had a significant reduction in weight compared with the control group, and the intervention had no negative effect on breastfeeding behavior. Another meta-analysis of 11 randomized controlled trials included 769 postpartum women, with interventions of 10-52 weeks. The results showed that the most effective way to lose weight was exercise intervention with objective goals, such as heart rate monitoring or the use of pedometers, indicating that lifestyle intervention is beneficial for weight loss in postpartum women, and exercise combined with intensive dietary intervention and setting objective goals is the most effective intervention method.

sentences.sentence_en: VI. Cognitive-behavioral and psychological interventions

paragraphs.paragraph_en: VI. Cognitive-behavioral and psychological interventions

paragraphs.paragraph: (一)背景

sentences.sentence: (一)背景
sentences.sentence_en: 1. Background

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 1. Background

paragraphs.paragraph: 生活方式干预作为基础治疗，是一种囊括营养、运动、认知-行为及心理多方面的综合干预模式。认知-行为及心理干预是通过调整超重和肥胖患者的生活环境及心理状态，帮助患者理解和认识体重管理、肥胖及其危害，从而做出行为改变。其中包括自我监控、控制进食、刺激控制、认知重建和放松技巧等。

sentences.sentence: 生活方式干预作为基础治疗，是一种囊括营养、运动、认知-行为及心理多方面的综合干预模式。认知-行为及心理干预是通过调整超重和肥胖患者的生活环境及心理状态，帮助患者理解和认识体重管理、肥胖及其危害，从而做出行为改变。
sentences.sentence_en: Lifestyle intervention, as a basic treatment, is a comprehensive intervention model that includes nutrition, exercise, cognitive-behavioral and psychological aspects. Cognitive-behavioral and psychological intervention is to help overweight and obese patients understand and recognize weight management, obesity and its harms by adjusting their living environment and psychological state, so as to make behavioral changes.

sentences.sentence: 其中包括自我监控、控制进食、刺激控制、认知重建和放松技巧等。
sentences.sentence_en: These include self-monitoring, controlled eating, stimulus control, cognitive restructuring, and relaxation techniques.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: Lifestyle intervention, as a basic treatment, is a comprehensive intervention model that includes nutrition, exercise, cognitive-behavioral and psychological aspects. Cognitive-behavioral and psychological intervention is to help overweight and obese patients understand and recognize weight management, obesity and its hazards by adjusting their living environment and psychological state, so as to make behavioral changes. This includes self-monitoring, eating control, stimulus control, cognitive reconstruction and relaxation techniques.

paragraphs.paragraph: (二)证据

sentences.sentence: (二)证据
sentences.sentence_en: (II) Evidence

paragraphs.paragraph_en: (II) Evidence

paragraphs.paragraph: 1.认知-行为干预：认知-行为干预配合体力活动和饮食调整，能够明显降低体重，且超过6个月的行为干预比低于6个月的效果更明显。美国女性健康研究发现进行6-54个月的干预后，干预组的体重和腰围较对照组明显下降。行为干预对减重后体重的维持也有明显作用。研究证明行为干预提升了患者的理论认识，包括对其激励、支持，指导自我监控(饮食、运动和情绪管理)，从而更有利于保持减重效果。通过小组和面对面个人辅导的干预可以从不同方式进行指导，以维持远期减重效果。

sentences.sentence: 1.认知-行为干预：认知-行为干预配合体力活动和饮食调整，能够明显降低体重，且超过6个月的行为干预比低于6个月的效果更明显。
sentences.sentence_en: 1. Cognitive-behavioral intervention: Cognitive-behavioral intervention combined with physical activity and dietary adjustment can significantly reduce body weight, and behavioral intervention for more than 6 months is more effective than that for less than 6 months.

sentences.sentence: 美国女性健康研究发现进行6-54个月的干预后，干预组的体重和腰围较对照组明显下降。
sentences.sentence_en: The American Women's Health Study found that after 6-54 months of intervention, the weight and waist circumference of the intervention group were significantly lower than those of the control group.

sentences.sentence: 行为干预对减重后体重的维持也有明显作用。
sentences.sentence_en: Behavioral intervention also has a significant effect on maintaining weight after weight loss.

sentences.sentence: 研究证明行为干预提升了患者的理论认识，包括对其激励、支持，指导自我监控(饮食、运动和情绪管理)，从而更有利于保持减重效果。
sentences.sentence_en: Studies have shown that behavioral intervention improves patients' theoretical understanding, including motivation, support, and guidance on self-monitoring (diet, exercise, and emotional management), which is more conducive to maintaining weight loss results.

sentences.sentence: 通过小组和面对面个人辅导的干预可以从不同方式进行指导，以维持远期减重效果。
sentences.sentence_en: Interventions through group and face-to-face individual counseling can be directed in different ways to maintain long-term weight loss.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 1. Cognitive-behavioral intervention: Cognitive-behavioral intervention combined with physical activity and dietary adjustment can significantly reduce body weight, and behavioral intervention for more than 6 months is more effective than that for less than 6 months. The American Women's Health Study found that after 6-54 months of intervention, the weight and waist circumference of the intervention group were significantly lower than those of the control group. Behavioral intervention also has a significant effect on maintaining weight after weight loss. Studies have shown that behavioral intervention enhances patients' theoretical understanding, including motivation, support, and guidance on self-monitoring (diet, exercise, and emotional management), which is more conducive to maintaining weight loss results. Interventions through group and face-to-face individual counseling can be guided in different ways to maintain long-term weight loss effects.

paragraphs.paragraph: 2.精神-心理支持：肥胖者常见的心理因素如压力、沮丧、抑郁容易导致过度进食，并引发罪恶感面陷人恶性循环中。精神-心理支持中需要医务人员能识别干扰减重管理成功的心理或精神疾患，并请专科医师进行治疗。在医疗活动中，肥胖患者可能会因为各种心理社会原因而拒绝寻求减重帮助。应对患者表达充分尊重，仔细倾听并建立信任，通过健康教育提高其对肥胖加重疾病危险性的认识，不应忽略任何细微进步，给予及时、适当的奖励和称赞，这对于肥胖儿童的管理尤其重要。

sentences.sentence: 2.精神-心理支持：肥胖者常见的心理因素如压力、沮丧、抑郁容易导致过度进食，并引发罪恶感面陷人恶性循环中。精神-心理支持中需要医务人员能识别干扰减重管理成功的心理或精神疾患，并请专科医师进行治疗。
sentences.sentence_en: 2. Mental-psychological support: Common psychological factors in obese people, such as stress, frustration, and depression, can easily lead to overeating and trigger guilt, which can lead to a vicious cycle. Mental-psychological support requires medical staff to identify psychological or mental illnesses that interfere with successful weight loss management and ask specialists to treat them.

sentences.sentence: 在医疗活动中，肥胖患者可能会因为各种心理社会原因而拒绝寻求减重帮助。
sentences.sentence_en: In healthcare settings, obese patients may refuse to seek help for weight loss for a variety of psychosocial reasons.

sentences.sentence: 应对患者表达充分尊重，仔细倾听并建立信任，通过健康教育提高其对肥胖加重疾病危险性的认识，不应忽略任何细微进步，给予及时、适当的奖励和称赞，这对于肥胖儿童的管理尤其重要。
sentences.sentence_en: Full respect should be shown to patients, careful listening should be done and trust should be established. Health education should be used to raise their awareness of the dangers of obesity-aggravated diseases. No subtle progress should be ignored, and timely and appropriate rewards and praise should be given. This is especially important for the management of obese children.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 2. Spiritual-psychological support: Common psychological factors in obese people, such as stress, frustration, and depression, can easily lead to overeating and trigger a vicious cycle of guilt. Psychological-psychological support requires medical staff to identify psychological or mental illnesses that interfere with successful weight loss management and ask specialists for treatment. In medical activities, obese patients may refuse to seek help for weight loss due to various psychosocial reasons. Full respect should be expressed to patients, and they should be listened to carefully and trust should be established. Health education should be used to improve their awareness of the risk of obesity-aggravated diseases. Any subtle progress should not be ignored, and timely and appropriate rewards and praise should be given. This is especially important for the management of obese children.

paragraphs.paragraph: 七、减重治疗后的维持

sentences.sentence: 七、减重治疗后的维持
sentences.sentence_en: 7. Maintenance after weight loss therapy

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 7. Maintenance after weight loss therapy

paragraphs.paragraph: (一)背景

sentences.sentence: (一)背景
sentences.sentence_en: 1. Background

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 1. Background

paragraphs.paragraph: 治疗后减重的维持非常重要。机体存在多种机制调控能量平衡以维持自身体重相对稳定，通常减重计划结束后一年，大部分人会恢复已减掉体重(复重)的30%~35%，4年内基本恢复到减重前水平。发表于新英格兰医学杂志和美国医学会杂志的2项随机对照试验表明，适当的干预措施可在一定程度上延长减重后体重的维持时间。世界胃肠病学会对肥胖管理制定的全球指南(WGO)强调，为了维持减重效果，医务人员和营养医师应向患者提供面对面或电话随访的减重维持计划，保持与患者的规律接触(每月或更加频繁)，帮助其进行高强度体力活动(如200~300min/周)，规律监测体重变化(如每周或更加频繁)，并保持低能量饮食(维持更低体重所必需)。

sentences.sentence: 治疗后减重的维持非常重要。
sentences.sentence_en: Maintenance of weight loss after treatment is very important.

sentences.sentence: 机体存在多种机制调控能量平衡以维持自身体重相对稳定，通常减重计划结束后一年，大部分人会恢复已减掉体重(复重)的30%~35%，4年内基本恢复到减重前水平。发表于新英格兰医学杂志和美国医学会杂志的2项随机对照试验表明，适当的干预措施可在一定程度上延长减重后体重的维持时间。世界胃肠病学会对肥胖管理制定的全球指南(WGO)强调，为了维持减重效果，医务人员和营养医师应向患者提供面对面或电话随访的减重维持计划，保持与患者的规律接触(每月或更加频繁)，帮助其进行高强度体力活动(如200~300min/周)，规律监测体重变化(如每周或更加频繁)，并保持低能量饮食(维持更低体重所必需)。

entities.entity_en: Physical activity (eg, 200 to 300 minutes per week)

sentences.sentence_en: The body has a variety of mechanisms to regulate energy balance to maintain a relatively stable body weight. Usually, one year after the end of a weight loss program, most people will regain 30% to 35% of the weight they have lost (regain weight), and basically return to the pre-weight loss level within 4 years. Two randomized controlled trials published in the New England Journal of Medicine and the Journal of the American Medical Association showed that appropriate intervention measures can prolong the maintenance time of weight loss to a certain extent. The global guidelines for obesity management developed by the World Society of Gastroenterology (WGO) emphasize that in order to maintain the weight loss effect, medical staff and nutritionists should provide patients with face-to-face or telephone follow-up weight loss maintenance plans, maintain regular contact with patients (monthly or more frequently), help them perform high-intensity physical activities (such as 200-300 minutes/week), regularly monitor weight changes (such as weekly or more frequently), and maintain a low-energy diet (necessary to maintain a lower weight).

paragraphs.paragraph_en: Maintenance of weight loss after treatment is very important. The body has a variety of mechanisms to regulate energy balance to maintain its own body weight relatively stable. Usually one year after the end of the weight loss plan, most people will regain 30% to 35% of the weight they have lost (regain weight), and basically return to the pre-weight loss level within 4 years. Two randomized controlled trials published in the New England Journal of Medicine and the Journal of the American Medical Association showed that appropriate intervention measures can prolong the maintenance time of weight loss to a certain extent. The global guidelines for obesity management developed by the World Society of Gastroenterology (WGO) emphasize that in order to maintain the weight loss effect, medical staff and nutritionists should provide patients with face-to-face or telephone follow-up weight loss maintenance plans, maintain regular contact with patients (monthly or more frequently), help them perform high-intensity physical activities (such as 200-300 minutes/week), regularly monitor weight changes (such as weekly or more frequently), and maintain a low-energy diet (necessary to maintain a lower weight).

paragraphs.paragraph: (二)证据

sentences.sentence: (二)证据
sentences.sentence_en: (II) Evidence

paragraphs.paragraph_en: (II) Evidence

paragraphs.paragraph: 1.饮食控制和体育锻炼：一篇纳入了从1984年至2007年间42项随机对照试验的系统性综述认为，生活方式和行为干预措施[包括饮食控制和(或)代餐、体育锻炼、保持减重小组间人员交流等]配合一定的药物治疗，对减少减重后复重有效型。Dombrowski等对非手术干预成人肥胖者减重后的长期维持进行了系统回顾和Mela分析，包含45项研究的7788例患者，结果显示包括食物摄取和体力活动在内的行为干预可以使患者较对照组复重减少1.56kg。

sentences.sentence: 1.饮食控制和体育锻炼：一篇纳入了从1984年至2007年间42项随机对照试验的系统性综述认为，生活方式和行为干预措施[包括饮食控制和(或)代餐、体育锻炼、保持减重小组间人员交流等]配合一定的药物治疗，对减少减重后复重有效型。Dombrowski等对非手术干预成人肥胖者减重后的长期维持进行了系统回顾和Mela分析，包含45项研究的7788例患者，结果显示包括食物摄取和体力活动在内的行为干预可以使患者较对照组复重减少1.56kg。

entities.entity: 保持减重小组间人员交流
entities.entity_en: Maintain communication between weight loss groups

sentences.sentence_en: 1. Dietary control and physical exercise: A systematic review of 42 randomized controlled trials from 1984 to 2007 concluded that lifestyle and behavioral interventions [including dietary control and/or meal replacement, physical exercise, maintaining communication between weight loss groups, etc.] combined with certain drug treatments are effective in reducing weight regain after weight loss. Dombrowski et al. conducted a systematic review and Mela analysis of long-term maintenance of weight loss in obese adults after non-surgical intervention, including 7,788 patients in 45 studies. The results showed that behavioral interventions including food intake and physical activity could reduce patients' weight regain by 1.56 kg compared with the control group.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 1. Dietary control and physical exercise: A systematic review of 42 randomized controlled trials from 1984 to 2007 found that lifestyle and behavioral interventions [including dietary control and/or meal replacement, physical exercise, maintaining communication between weight loss groups, etc.] combined with certain drug treatments are effective in reducing weight regain after weight loss. Dombrowski et al. conducted a systematic review and Mela analysis of long-term maintenance of weight loss in obese adults after non-surgical intervention, including 7,788 patients in 45 studies. The results showed that behavioral interventions including food intake and physical activity could reduce patients' weight regain by 1.56 kg compared with the control group.

paragraphs.paragraph: 2.心理因素：减重所引起的能量负平衡和能量储备的降低会促使关键中枢和外周调节因素发生改变，从而导致减重者食欲的增加和能量消耗的减少，而导致减重成功后的复重。这种调节作用不会在新的体重稳态形成后消退，这会促使减重成功者在心理和身体诱因的驱动下恢复减掉的体重。

sentences.sentence: 2.心理因素：减重所引起的能量负平衡和能量储备的降低会促使关键中枢和外周调节因素发生改变，从而导致减重者食欲的增加和能量消耗的减少，而导致减重成功后的复重。
sentences.sentence_en: 2. Psychological factors: The negative energy balance and reduced energy reserves caused by weight loss will prompt changes in key central and peripheral regulatory factors, thereby leading to an increase in appetite and a decrease in energy expenditure in weight losers, resulting in weight regain after successful weight loss.

sentences.sentence: 这种调节作用不会在新的体重稳态形成后消退，这会促使减重成功者在心理和身体诱因的驱动下恢复减掉的体重。
sentences.sentence_en: This regulatory effect does not disappear after a new weight homeostasis is established, which can cause successful weight loss participants to regain lost weight driven by psychological and physical triggers.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 2. Psychological factors: The negative energy balance and reduced energy reserves caused by weight loss will cause changes in key central and peripheral regulatory factors, leading to an increase in appetite and a decrease in energy consumption, which will lead to weight regain after successful weight loss. This regulatory effect will not disappear after the new weight homeostasis is formed, which will prompt successful weight losers to regain the lost weight driven by psychological and physical factors.

paragraphs.paragraph: 3.网络干预：随着互联网时代对健康产生的深远影响，越来越多的研究表明网络干预对维持减重(尤其在2年以内)有效。2项设计良好的大样本随机对照试验结果均显示，在短期随访(24个月内)利用相互帮扶技术干预组的体重回升明显低于自我控制组。一个纳入5项研究的Meta分析发现，网络干预与面对面干预效果相同，高网站利用率与减重维持正相关。

sentences.sentence: 3.网络干预：随着互联网时代对健康产生的深远影响，越来越多的研究表明网络干预对维持减重(尤其在2年以内)有效。
sentences.sentence_en: 3. Internet intervention: With the profound impact of the Internet era on health, more and more studies have shown that Internet intervention is effective in maintaining weight loss (especially within 2 years).

sentences.sentence: 2项设计良好的大样本随机对照试验结果均显示，在短期随访(24个月内)利用相互帮扶技术干预组的体重回升明显低于自我控制组。
sentences.sentence_en: The results of two well-designed large-sample randomized controlled trials showed that in the short-term follow-up (within 24 months), the weight regain in the group using mutual assistance technology intervention was significantly lower than that in the self-control group.

sentences.sentence: 一个纳入5项研究的Meta分析发现，网络干预与面对面干预效果相同，高网站利用率与减重维持正相关。
sentences.sentence_en: A meta-analysis of five studies found that online interventions were as effective as face-to-face interventions, and high website utilization was positively associated with weight loss maintenance.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 3. Internet intervention: With the profound impact of the Internet era on health, more and more studies have shown that Internet intervention is effective for maintaining weight loss (especially within 2 years). The results of two well-designed large-sample randomized controlled trials showed that in the short-term follow-up (within 24 months), the weight regain in the mutual assistance technology intervention group was significantly lower than that in the self-control group. A meta-analysis of 5 studies found that Internet intervention had the same effect as face-to-face intervention, and high website utilization was positively correlated with weight loss maintenance.

paragraphs.paragraph: 一、儿童/青少年肥胖体重管理

sentences.sentence: 一、儿童/青少年肥胖体重管理
sentences.sentence_en: 1. Obesity and weight management in children and adolescents

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 1. Obesity and weight management in children and adolescents

paragraphs.paragraph: (一)背景

sentences.sentence: (一)背景
sentences.sentence_en: 1. Background

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 1. Background

paragraphs.paragraph: 儿童期肥胖容易伴随焦虑、自卑等心理问题，同时也是成人肥胖、糖尿病、心血管疾病及其他代谢性疾病和肿病的潜在危险因素。医学营养治疗主要通过培养良好的生活习惯而达到控制体重的目的。

sentences.sentence: 儿童期肥胖容易伴随焦虑、自卑等心理问题，同时也是成人肥胖、糖尿病、心血管疾病及其他代谢性疾病和肿病的潜在危险因素。医学营养治疗主要通过培养良好的生活习惯而达到控制体重的目的。
sentences.sentence_en: Childhood obesity is easily accompanied by psychological problems such as anxiety and low self-esteem, and is also a potential risk factor for adult obesity, diabetes, cardiovascular disease, and other metabolic diseases and tumors. Medical nutrition therapy mainly achieves the goal of controlling weight by cultivating good living habits.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: Childhood obesity is easily accompanied by psychological problems such as anxiety and low self-esteem, and is also a potential risk factor for adult obesity, diabetes, cardiovascular disease, and other metabolic diseases and tumors. Medical nutrition therapy mainly achieves the goal of controlling weight by cultivating good living habits.

sentences.sentence: (二)证据
sentences.sentence_en: (II) Evidence

paragraphs.paragraph_en: (II) Evidence

paragraphs.paragraph: 1.母乳喂养与肥胖：一篇纳入25项研究的Meta分析发现，相对于未母乳喂养过的新生儿，母乳喂养者发生儿童期肥胖的比率降低22%，且母乳喂养时间与肥胖发生率有剂量-效应关系。这与配方喂养提供了较高的脂肪和蛋白质，以及缺乏母乳中含有较多的活性物质可能有关。

sentences.sentence: 1.母乳喂养与肥胖：一篇纳入25项研究的Meta分析发现，相对于未母乳喂养过的新生儿，母乳喂养者发生儿童期肥胖的比率降低22%，且母乳喂养时间与肥胖发生率有剂量-效应关系。
sentences.sentence_en: 1. Breastfeeding and obesity: A meta-analysis of 25 studies found that compared with newborns who were not breastfed, the incidence of childhood obesity in breastfed infants was 22% lower, and there was a dose-effect relationship between breastfeeding duration and the incidence of obesity.

sentences.sentence: 这与配方喂养提供了较高的脂肪和蛋白质，以及缺乏母乳中含有较多的活性物质可能有关。
sentences.sentence_en: This may be related to the fact that formula feeding provides higher fat and protein, and lacks the more active substances contained in breast milk.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 1. Breastfeeding and obesity: A meta-analysis of 25 studies found that compared with newborns who were not breastfed, the incidence of childhood obesity in breastfed infants was 22% lower, and there was a dose-effect relationship between breastfeeding duration and the incidence of obesity. This may be related to the fact that formula feeding provides higher fat and protein, and lacks more active substances in breast milk.

paragraphs.paragraph: 2.规律早餐与BMI：横断面研究表明，不爱吃早餐的群体发生超重和肥胖的比例更大。芬兰一项出生队列研究发现，相对于规律进食早餐的青少年，很少吃早餐的群体更容易吸烟、喝酒、咖啡以及含有咖啡因的碳酸饮料，并且很少锻炼，BMI值更高。

sentences.sentence: 2.规律早餐与BMI：横断面研究表明，不爱吃早餐的群体发生超重和肥胖的比例更大。芬兰一项出生队列研究发现，相对于规律进食早餐的青少年，很少吃早餐的群体更容易吸烟、喝酒、咖啡以及含有咖啡因的碳酸饮料，并且很少锻炼，BMI值更高。
sentences.sentence_en: 2. Regular breakfast and BMI: Cross-sectional studies have shown that people who do not like to eat breakfast are more likely to be overweight and obese. A birth cohort study in Finland found that compared with adolescents who eat breakfast regularly, those who rarely eat breakfast are more likely to smoke, drink alcohol, coffee and caffeinated carbonated drinks, and rarely exercise, and have a higher BMI.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 2. Regular breakfast and BMI: Cross-sectional studies have shown that people who do not like to eat breakfast are more likely to be overweight and obese. A birth cohort study in Finland found that compared with adolescents who eat breakfast regularly, those who rarely eat breakfast are more likely to smoke, drink alcohol, coffee and caffeinated carbonated drinks, and rarely exercise, and have a higher BMI.

paragraphs.paragraph: 3.零食摄入与肥胖：一项队列研究表明，高能量零食的摄入频率及进食时间与青少年肥胖有紧密联系。每日2次以上零食的青少年其肥胖风险比(risk ratio，RR) 高于很少吃零食的青少年；以在早晨吃高能量零食的青少年为对照组，夜间进食零食的受试者发生肥胖和超重的RR为3.12。一项长达19个月的队列研究表明，每天多喝12盎司(ounce，I盎司=28.4ml，12盎司约合340ml)的含糖饮料，将会导致BMI升高0.24kg/m2。横断面研究发现，碳酸饮料与儿童期的肥胖有着密切关系，每周多摄入碳酸饮料240ml的青少年发生肥胖的危险增加29%。

sentences.sentence: 3.零食摄入与肥胖：一项队列研究表明，高能量零食的摄入频率及进食时间与青少年肥胖有紧密联系。
sentences.sentence_en: 3. Snack intake and obesity: A cohort study showed that the frequency and time of high-energy snack intake are closely related to adolescent obesity.

sentences.sentence: 每日2次以上零食的青少年其肥胖风险比(risk ratio，RR) 高于很少吃零食的青少年；以在早晨吃高能量零食的青少年为对照组，夜间进食零食的受试者发生肥胖和超重的RR为3.12。
sentences.sentence_en: Adolescents who eat snacks more than twice a day have a higher risk ratio (RR) for obesity than those who rarely eat snacks. Compared with adolescents who eat high-energy snacks in the morning as the control group, the RR of obesity and overweight among subjects who eat snacks at night is 3.12.

sentences.sentence: 一项长达19个月的队列研究表明，每天多喝12盎司(ounce，I盎司=28.4ml，12盎司约合340ml)的含糖饮料，将会导致BMI升高0.24kg/m2。
sentences.sentence_en: A 19-month cohort study showed that drinking an extra 12 ounces (ounce, 1 ounce = 28.4 ml, 12 ounces is approximately 340 ml) of sugary drinks per day will lead to an increase in BMI by 0.24 kg/m2.

sentences.sentence: 横断面研究发现，碳酸饮料与儿童期的肥胖有着密切关系，每周多摄入碳酸饮料240ml的青少年发生肥胖的危险增加29%。
sentences.sentence_en: Cross-sectional studies have found that carbonated drinks are closely related to childhood obesity, and adolescents who consume 240 ml more carbonated drinks per week have a 29% increased risk of obesity.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 3. Snack intake and obesity: A cohort study showed that the frequency and time of high-energy snack intake are closely related to adolescent obesity. Adolescents who eat snacks more than twice a day have a higher risk ratio (RR) for obesity than those who rarely eat snacks; taking adolescents who eat high-energy snacks in the morning as the control group, the RR of obesity and overweight in subjects who eat snacks at night is 3.12. A 19-month cohort study showed that drinking 12 ounces (ounce, 1 ounce = 28.4 ml, 12 ounces is about 340 ml) of sugary drinks a day will lead to an increase in BMI by 0.24 kg/m2. Cross-sectional studies have found that carbonated beverages are closely related to childhood obesity. Adolescents who consume 240 ml more carbonated beverages per week have a 29% increased risk of obesity.

paragraphs.paragraph: 4.碳水化合物与肥胖：一项队列研究表明.青少年女性膳食中血糖指数(glycemic-index)每升高1SD，BMI和腰围分别增加0.77kg/m2和1.45cm；而膳食纤维摄入最每增加1SD，会导致青少年女性BMI值降低0.44kg/m2和青少年男性腰降低1.45cm。

sentences.sentence: 4.碳水化合物与肥胖：一项队列研究表明.青少年女性膳食中血糖指数(glycemic-index)每升高1SD，BMI和腰围分别增加0.77kg/m2和1.45cm；而膳食纤维摄入最每增加1SD，会导致青少年女性BMI值降低0.44kg/m2和青少年男性腰降低1.45cm。
sentences.sentence_en: 4. Carbohydrates and obesity: A cohort study showed that for every 1SD increase in the glycemic index in the diet of adolescent women, BMI and waist circumference increased by 0.77kg/m2 and 1.45cm respectively; while for every 1SD increase in dietary fiber intake, the BMI of adolescent women decreased by 0.44kg/m2 and the waist circumference of adolescent men decreased by 1.45cm.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 4. Carbohydrates and obesity: A cohort study showed that for every 1SD increase in the glycemic index in the diet of adolescent women, BMI and waist circumference increased by 0.77kg/m2 and 1.45cm respectively; while for every 1SD increase in dietary fiber intake, the BMI of adolescent women decreased by 0.44kg/m2 and the waist circumference of adolescent men decreased by 1.45cm.

paragraphs.paragraph: 5.微量营养素摄入与肥胖：研究表明血清维生素B12和叶酸的浓度与青少年BMI值、躯干脂肪面积以及总脂肪面积呈负相关。一项病例对照研究表明，肥胖儿童血清中维生素B12水平为400ng/L，明显低于正常体重的儿童血清中维生素B12的水平(530ng/L)；相对于正常体重儿童，在调整性别和年龄等混杂因素的影响后，肥胖儿童血清中维生素B12偏低的风险比(odds ratio，OR)高达4.33。也有研究发现，肥胖儿童血清中含有更低水平的Zn、Se和Fe，但血清Cu的水平较高；血清Zn的水平和血清中总胆固醇水平有呈明显负相关，而与血清中HDL-C水平正相关。维生素D的水平与儿童肥胖的负相关也得到了进一步的证实。

sentences.sentence: 5.微量营养素摄入与肥胖：研究表明血清维生素B12和叶酸的浓度与青少年BMI值、躯干脂肪面积以及总脂肪面积呈负相关。一项病例对照研究表明，肥胖儿童血清中维生素B12水平为400ng/L，明显低于正常体重的儿童血清中维生素B12的水平(530ng/L)；相对于正常体重儿童，在调整性别和年龄等混杂因素的影响后，肥胖儿童血清中维生素B12偏低的风险比(odds ratio，OR)高达4.33。也有研究发现，肥胖儿童血清中含有更低水平的Zn、Se和Fe，但血清Cu的水平较高；血清Zn的水平和血清中总胆固醇水平有呈明显负相关，而与血清中HDL-C水平正相关。
sentences.sentence_en: 5. Micronutrient intake and obesity: Studies have shown that serum vitamin B12 and folic acid concentrations are negatively correlated with adolescent BMI, trunk fat area, and total fat area. A case-control study showed that the serum vitamin B12 level in obese children was 400 ng/L, which was significantly lower than that in children of normal weight (530 ng/L); compared with children of normal weight, after adjusting for confounding factors such as gender and age, the odds ratio (OR) of low serum vitamin B12 in obese children was as high as 4.33. Other studies have found that obese children have lower levels of Zn, Se, and Fe in their serum, but higher levels of serum Cu; serum Zn levels are significantly negatively correlated with serum total cholesterol levels, but positively correlated with serum HDL-C levels.

sentences.sentence: 维生素D的水平与儿童肥胖的负相关也得到了进一步的证实。
sentences.sentence_en: The negative correlation between vitamin D levels and childhood obesity has also been further confirmed.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 5. Micronutrient intake and obesity: Studies have shown that serum vitamin B12 and folic acid concentrations are negatively correlated with adolescent BMI, trunk fat area, and total fat area. A case-control study showed that the serum vitamin B12 level in obese children was 400 ng/L, which was significantly lower than that in children of normal weight (530 ng/L); compared with children of normal weight, after adjusting for confounding factors such as gender and age, the odds ratio (OR) of low serum vitamin B12 in obese children was as high as 4.33. Other studies have found that obese children have lower levels of Zn, Se, and Fe in their serum, but higher levels of serum Cu; serum Zn levels are significantly negatively correlated with serum total cholesterol levels, but positively correlated with serum HDL-C levels. The negative correlation between vitamin D levels and childhood obesity has also been further confirmed.
