paragraphs.paragraph: 二、围孕期体重管理

sentences.sentence: 二、围孕期体重管理
sentences.sentence_en: 2. Periconceptional weight management

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 2. Periconceptional weight management

paragraphs.paragraph: (一)背景

sentences.sentence: (一)背景
sentences.sentence_en: 1. Background

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 1. Background

paragraphs.paragraph: 大量研究显示，母体孕前及孕期的肥胖均与孕期合并症及不良妊娠结局相关，包括妊娠期糖尿病、妊娠高血压、子痫、早产、死胎、巨大儿、过期产、剖宫产、先天畸形等；远期不良影响包括产后母体及子代肥胖，增加母婴罹患2型糖尿病、高血压及其他代谢综合征的风险。

sentences.sentence: 大量研究显示，母体孕前及孕期的肥胖均与孕期合并症及不良妊娠结局相关，包括妊娠期糖尿病、妊娠高血压、子痫、早产、死胎、巨大儿、过期产、剖宫产、先天畸形等；远期不良影响包括产后母体及子代肥胖，增加母婴罹患2型糖尿病、高血压及其他代谢综合征的风险。
sentences.sentence_en: A large number of studies have shown that maternal obesity before and during pregnancy is associated with pregnancy complications and adverse pregnancy outcomes, including gestational diabetes, gestational hypertension, eclampsia, premature birth, stillbirth, macrosomia, post-term birth, cesarean section, congenital malformations, etc.; long-term adverse effects include postpartum maternal and offspring obesity, and increased risks of mother and infant developing type 2 diabetes, hypertension and other metabolic syndromes.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: A large number of studies have shown that maternal obesity before and during pregnancy is associated with pregnancy complications and adverse pregnancy outcomes, including gestational diabetes, gestational hypertension, eclampsia, premature birth, stillbirth, macrosomia, post-term birth, cesarean section, congenital malformations, etc.; long-term adverse effects include postpartum maternal and offspring obesity, and increased risks of mother and infant developing type 2 diabetes, hypertension and other metabolic syndromes.

paragraphs.paragraph: (二)证据

sentences.sentence: (二)证据
sentences.sentence_en: (II) Evidence

paragraphs.paragraph_en: (II) Evidence

paragraphs.paragraph: 1.肥胖与生育能力：一项前瞻性研究发现，超重女性生育能力下降8%，肥胖者下降达18%。肥胖不仅影响自然受孕，同样影响辅助生殖的成功，增加自然流产及孕期并发症的风险。应强调在辅助生殖实施前进行减重。同时也有研究证实减重5%~10%就可以成功减掉30%的内脏脂肪，更有利于排卵发生。

sentences.sentence: 1.肥胖与生育能力：一项前瞻性研究发现，超重女性生育能力下降8%，肥胖者下降达18%。
sentences.sentence_en: 1. Obesity and fertility: A prospective study found that the fertility of overweight women decreased by 8%, and that of obese women decreased by 18%.

sentences.sentence: 肥胖不仅影响自然受孕，同样影响辅助生殖的成功，增加自然流产及孕期并发症的风险。
sentences.sentence_en: Obesity not only affects natural conception, but also affects the success of assisted reproduction, increasing the risk of spontaneous abortion and pregnancy complications.

sentences.sentence: 应强调在辅助生殖实施前进行减重。
sentences.sentence_en: Weight loss before assisted reproduction should be emphasized.

sentences.sentence: 同时也有研究证实减重5%~10%就可以成功减掉30%的内脏脂肪，更有利于排卵发生。
sentences.sentence_en: At the same time, studies have confirmed that losing 5% to 10% of weight can successfully reduce 30% of visceral fat, which is more conducive to ovulation.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 1. Obesity and fertility: A prospective study found that the fertility of overweight women decreased by 8%, and that of obese women decreased by 18%. Obesity not only affects natural conception, but also the success of assisted reproduction, increasing the risk of spontaneous abortion and complications during pregnancy. Weight loss should be emphasized before assisted reproduction. At the same time, studies have also confirmed that losing 5% to 10% of weight can successfully reduce 30% of visceral fat, which is more conducive to ovulation.

paragraphs.paragraph: 2.肥胖女性孕期体重：2009年美国医学研究所推荐建议孕早期增重0.5~2.0kg，超重女性孕期增重7.0~11.5kg，肥胖女性孕期增重5.0~9.0kg。相对于孕期增重超过7.0kg的肥胖女性，孕期增重低于7.0kg的肥胖女性发生子痫前期、剖宫产及巨大儿的几率明显降低。美国一项涉及113019例新生儿研究中，肥胖孕妇过低的体重增加加重孕妇早产的风险。

sentences.sentence: 2.肥胖女性孕期体重：2009年美国医学研究所推荐建议孕早期增重0.5~2.0kg，超重女性孕期增重7.0~11.5kg，肥胖女性孕期增重5.0~9.0kg。
sentences.sentence_en: 2. Weight gain of obese women during pregnancy: In 2009, the American Institute of Medicine recommended a weight gain of 0.5-2.0 kg in the early stages of pregnancy, 7.0-11.5 kg for overweight women, and 5.0-9.0 kg for obese women.

sentences.sentence: 相对于孕期增重超过7.0kg的肥胖女性，孕期增重低于7.0kg的肥胖女性发生子痫前期、剖宫产及巨大儿的几率明显降低。
sentences.sentence_en: Compared with obese women who gain more than 7.0 kg during pregnancy, obese women who gain less than 7.0 kg during pregnancy have a significantly lower risk of preeclampsia, cesarean section and macrosomia.

sentences.sentence: 美国一项涉及113019例新生儿研究中，肥胖孕妇过低的体重增加加重孕妇早产的风险。
sentences.sentence_en: A US study involving 113,019 newborns found that low weight gain in obese pregnant women increased the risk of premature birth.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 2. Weight gain of obese women during pregnancy: In 2009, the Institute of Medicine of the United States recommended that women gain 0.5-2.0 kg in early pregnancy, overweight women gain 7.0-11.5 kg in pregnancy, and obese women gain 5.0-9.0 kg in pregnancy. Compared with obese women who gain more than 7.0 kg during pregnancy, obese women who gain less than 7.0 kg during pregnancy have a significantly lower chance of developing preeclampsia, cesarean section, and macrosomia. In a US study involving 113,019 newborns, too little weight gain in obese pregnant women increased the risk of premature birth.

paragraphs.paragraph: 3.肥胖女性妊娠期体重管理：在一项1777例妊娠妇女队列研究中，用替代健康饮食指数(the alternative healthy eating index，AHEI)进行膳食评价，发现肥胖孕妇AHEI分数更低。另一项2247例妊娠妇女队列研究也发现，高能量、低营养素含量的食物(如碳酸饮料、果汁饮料、精制面粉)也是过高能量摄入的主要贡献者，同时此类膳食富含饱和脂肪酸。小样本研究显示：当肥胖合并妊娠期糖尿病的孕妇能量限制在1800kcal左右时，孕妇体重能够得到控制且不出现酮症，也能够改善孕妇血糖水平并对新生儿出生体重无不良影响。建议根据肥胖孕妇的身高、体重、年龄、活动水平等因素制定个体化的膳食能量计划。相对于BMI正常的孕妇，肥胖孕妇的新生儿神经管畸形发病率更高。

sentences.sentence: 3.肥胖女性妊娠期体重管理：在一项1777例妊娠妇女队列研究中，用替代健康饮食指数(the alternative healthy eating index，AHEI)进行膳食评价，发现肥胖孕妇AHEI分数更低。另一项2247例妊娠妇女队列研究也发现，高能量、低营养素含量的食物(如碳酸饮料、果汁饮料、精制面粉)也是过高能量摄入的主要贡献者，同时此类膳食富含饱和脂肪酸。小样本研究显示：当肥胖合并妊娠期糖尿病的孕妇能量限制在1800kcal左右时，孕妇体重能够得到控制且不出现酮症，也能够改善孕妇血糖水平并对新生儿出生体重无不良影响。
sentences.sentence_en: 3. Weight management during pregnancy for obese women: In a cohort study of 1,777 pregnant women, the alternative healthy eating index (AHEI) was used for dietary evaluation, and it was found that obese pregnant women had lower AHEI scores. Another cohort study of 2,247 pregnant women also found that high-energy, low-nutrient foods (such as carbonated drinks, fruit juice drinks, and refined flour) are also major contributors to excessive energy intake, and such diets are rich in saturated fatty acids. Small sample studies have shown that when the energy intake of obese pregnant women with gestational diabetes is restricted to around 1,800 kcal, the weight of the pregnant women can be controlled without ketosis, and the blood sugar level of the pregnant women can be improved without adverse effects on the birth weight of the newborn.

sentences.sentence: 建议根据肥胖孕妇的身高、体重、年龄、活动水平等因素制定个体化的膳食能量计划。
sentences.sentence_en: It is recommended to develop an individualized dietary energy plan based on the height, weight, age, activity level and other factors of obese pregnant women.

sentences.sentence: 相对于BMI正常的孕妇，肥胖孕妇的新生儿神经管畸形发病率更高。
sentences.sentence_en: Compared with pregnant women with normal BMI, obese pregnant women have a higher incidence of neural tube defects in their newborns.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 3. Weight management during pregnancy for obese women: In a cohort study of 1777 pregnant women, the alternative healthy eating index (AHEI) was used for dietary evaluation, and it was found that obese pregnant women had lower AHEI scores. Another cohort study of 2247 pregnant women also found that high-energy, low-nutrient foods (such as carbonated drinks, fruit juice drinks, and refined flour) are also major contributors to excessive energy intake, and such diets are rich in saturated fatty acids. Small sample studies have shown that when the energy of obese pregnant women with gestational diabetes is restricted to about 1800kcal, the weight of pregnant women can be controlled without ketosis, and the blood sugar level of pregnant women can be improved without adverse effects on the birth weight of newborns. It is recommended to formulate an individualized dietary energy plan based on the height, weight, age, activity level and other factors of obese pregnant women. Compared with pregnant women with normal BMI, obese pregnant women have a higher incidence of neural tube defects in newborns.

paragraphs.paragraph: 4.超重/肥胖女性产后体重的恢复：相对于正常BMI的女性，孕期增重过多的肥胖女性产后可能储备更多的体重。哺乳期进行膳食及运动干预可以帮助其产后恢复到孕前体重，产后哺乳至少6个月后可以降低产后体重。有研究显示，产后哺乳更有利于体重恢复。

sentences.sentence: 4.超重/肥胖女性产后体重的恢复：相对于正常BMI的女性，孕期增重过多的肥胖女性产后可能储备更多的体重。
sentences.sentence_en: 4. Postpartum weight recovery in overweight/obese women: Compared with women with normal BMI, obese women who gain too much weight during pregnancy may retain more weight after delivery.

sentences.sentence: 哺乳期进行膳食及运动干预可以帮助其产后恢复到孕前体重，产后哺乳至少6个月后可以降低产后体重。
sentences.sentence_en: Dietary and exercise intervention during lactation can help women return to their pre-pregnancy weight after delivery, and breastfeeding for at least 6 months after delivery can reduce postpartum weight.

sentences.sentence: 有研究显示，产后哺乳更有利于体重恢复。
sentences.sentence_en: Studies have shown that breastfeeding after childbirth is more conducive to weight recovery.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 4. Postpartum weight recovery for overweight/obese women: Compared with women with normal BMI, obese women who gain too much weight during pregnancy may retain more weight after giving birth. Dietary and exercise intervention during lactation can help them return to their pre-pregnancy weight after giving birth, and breastfeeding for at least 6 months after giving birth can reduce their postpartum weight. Studies have shown that breastfeeding after giving birth is more conducive to weight recovery.

paragraphs.paragraph: 三、多囊卵巢综合征(polyeystic ovary syndrome，PCOS)的体重管理

sentences.sentence: 三、多囊卵巢综合征(polyeystic ovary syndrome，PCOS)的体重管理

sentences.sentence_en: 3. Weight management in polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS)

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 3. Weight management in polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS)

paragraphs.paragraph: (一)背景

sentences.sentence: (一)背景
sentences.sentence_en: 1. Background

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 1. Background

paragraphs.paragraph: 在我国19~45岁的女性中PCOS的发病率约为5.6%。不同国家的研究显示PCOS患者肥胖的发生率在30%~70%。系统性综述表明，与正常体重的PCOS女性相比，肥胖PCOS患者所有代谢和生殖的指标(除多毛症外)，包括性激素结合球蛋白(sex hormone-binding globulin)下降，总睾酮、空腹血糖、空腹胰岛素增加和血脂升高。

sentences.sentence: 在我国19~45岁的女性中PCOS的发病率约为5.6%。
sentences.sentence_en: The incidence of PCOS among women aged 19 to 45 in my country is approximately 5.6%.

sentences.sentence: 不同国家的研究显示PCOS患者肥胖的发生率在30%~70%。系统性综述表明，与正常体重的PCOS女性相比，肥胖PCOS患者所有代谢和生殖的指标(除多毛症外)，包括性激素结合球蛋白(sex hormone-binding globulin)下降，总睾酮、空腹血糖、空腹胰岛素增加和血脂升高。

sentences.sentence_en: Studies in different countries have shown that the incidence of obesity in PCOS patients ranges from 30% to 70%. A systematic review showed that compared with normal-weight PCOS women, obese PCOS patients had decreased levels of all metabolic and reproductive indicators (except hirsutism), including sex hormone-binding globulin, increased total testosterone, fasting blood glucose, fasting insulin, and elevated blood lipids.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: The incidence of PCOS in women aged 19 to 45 in my country is about 5.6%. Studies in different countries have shown that the incidence of obesity in PCOS patients is between 30% and 70%. A systematic review showed that compared with normal-weight PCOS women, obese PCOS patients had decreased levels of all metabolic and reproductive indicators (except hirsutism), including sex hormone-binding globulin, increased total testosterone, fasting blood glucose, fasting insulin, and elevated blood lipids.

paragraphs.paragraph: (二)证据

sentences.sentence: (二)证据
sentences.sentence_en: (II) Evidence

paragraphs.paragraph_en: (II) Evidence

paragraphs.paragraph: 1.生活方式干预与PCOS：临床研究显示，PCOS患者对富含碳水化合物、高血糖指数食物以及高饱和脂肪的食物摄入均显著增加；同时具有总能量摄入过高以及久坐的特点。一项系统性综述表明，对于PCOS患者，在减轻体重、改善胰岛素抵抗及高雄激素血症等方面，生活方式干预(饮食、运动和行为干预)比药物治疗更有效。研究表明，超重或肥胖的PCOS患者轻度体重减轻(减少5%~10%)即可使血清睾酮浓度下降，也可恢复正常的排卵周期，并提高妊娠成功率。因此，对于超重和肥胖的PCOS患者，建议首先进行生活方式干预(饮食和运动)以减轻体重。

sentences.sentence: 1.生活方式干预与PCOS：临床研究显示，PCOS患者对富含碳水化合物、高血糖指数食物以及高饱和脂肪的食物摄入均显著增加；同时具有总能量摄入过高以及久坐的特点。一项系统性综述表明，对于PCOS患者，在减轻体重、改善胰岛素抵抗及高雄激素血症等方面，生活方式干预(饮食、运动和行为干预)比药物治疗更有效。研究表明，超重或肥胖的PCOS患者轻度体重减轻(减少5%~10%)即可使血清睾酮浓度下降，也可恢复正常的排卵周期，并提高妊娠成功率。因此，对于超重和肥胖的PCOS患者，建议首先进行生活方式干预(饮食和运动)以减轻体重。
sentences.sentence_en: 1. Lifestyle intervention and PCOS: Clinical studies have shown that PCOS patients have significantly increased intake of foods rich in carbohydrates, high glycemic index foods, and high saturated fat foods; they also have the characteristics of excessive total energy intake and long periods of sitting. A systematic review showed that for PCOS patients, lifestyle intervention (diet, exercise, and behavioral intervention) is more effective than drug therapy in terms of weight loss, improving insulin resistance and hyperandrogenism. Studies have shown that mild weight loss (5% to 10%) in overweight or obese PCOS patients can reduce serum testosterone concentrations, restore normal ovulation cycles, and increase pregnancy success rates. Therefore, for overweight and obese PCOS patients, it is recommended to first conduct lifestyle intervention (diet and exercise) to lose weight.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 1. Lifestyle intervention and PCOS: Clinical studies have shown that PCOS patients have significantly increased intake of foods rich in carbohydrates, high glycemic index foods, and high saturated fat foods; they also have the characteristics of excessive total energy intake and long periods of sitting. A systematic review showed that for PCOS patients, lifestyle intervention (diet, exercise, and behavioral intervention) is more effective than drug therapy in terms of weight loss, improving insulin resistance and hyperandrogenism. Studies have shown that mild weight loss (5% to 10%) in overweight or obese PCOS patients can reduce serum testosterone concentrations, restore normal ovulation cycles, and increase pregnancy success rates. Therefore, for overweight and obese PCOS patients, it is recommended to first conduct lifestyle intervention (diet and exercise) to lose weight.

paragraphs.paragraph: 2.饮食干预与PCOS：(1)限制总能量摄入：超重和肥胖的PCOS患者在减重时应以CRD为首选治疗。随机对照试验表明，CRD可改善肥胖PCOS女性的代谢及激素水平，每日饮食总能量中减少500~1000kcal，即在6~12个月减少7%~10%的原体重。(2)宏量营养素和血糖指数的选择：国内外研究显示，在限制总能量的基础上，高蛋白/低碳水化合物饮食(蛋白质30%、碳水化合物40%、脂肪30%，MHCD)和低蛋白/高碳水化合物饮食(蛋白质15%、碳水化合物55%、脂肪30%，CHCD)相比，均可降低体重和雄激素水平，MHCD明显增加胰岛素敏感性、减轻高胰岛素血症继而减轻胰岛素抵抗；低血糖指数饮食亦可通过降低PCOS患者(无论是否肥胖)胰岛素、睾酮水平，改善多毛和痤疮。因此，在限制总能量基础上，无论宏量营养素如何配比，均可实现体重减轻及改善临床结局的目的。

sentences.sentence: 2.饮食干预与PCOS：(1)限制总能量摄入：超重和肥胖的PCOS患者在减重时应以CRD为首选治疗。随机对照试验表明，CRD可改善肥胖PCOS女性的代谢及激素水平，每日饮食总能量中减少500~1000kcal，即在6~12个月减少7%~10%的原体重。(2)宏量营养素和血糖指数的选择：国内外研究显示，在限制总能量的基础上，高蛋白/低碳水化合物饮食(蛋白质30%、碳水化合物40%、脂肪30%，MHCD)和低蛋白/高碳水化合物饮食(蛋白质15%、碳水化合物55%、脂肪30%，CHCD)相比，均可降低体重和雄激素水平，MHCD明显增加胰岛素敏感性、减轻高胰岛素血症继而减轻胰岛素抵抗；低血糖指数饮食亦可通过降低PCOS患者(无论是否肥胖)胰岛素、睾酮水平，改善多毛和痤疮。
sentences.sentence_en: 2. Dietary intervention and PCOS: (1) Restricting total energy intake: CRD should be the first choice for overweight and obese PCOS patients when losing weight. Randomized controlled trials have shown that CRD can improve the metabolic and hormone levels of obese PCOS women. Reducing the total energy of the daily diet by 500-1000 kcal means reducing the original body weight by 7%-10% in 6-12 months. (2) Selection of macronutrients and glycemic index: Domestic and foreign studies have shown that on the basis of restricting total energy, high-protein/low-carbohydrate diet (protein 30%, carbohydrate 40%, fat 30%, MHCD) and low-protein/high-carbohydrate diet (protein 15%, carbohydrate 55%, fat 30%, CHCD) can reduce body weight and androgen levels. MHCD significantly increases insulin sensitivity, reduces hyperinsulinemia and then reduces insulin resistance. Low glycemic index diet can also improve hirsutism and acne by reducing insulin and testosterone levels in PCOS patients (regardless of obesity).

sentences.sentence: 因此，在限制总能量基础上，无论宏量营养素如何配比，均可实现体重减轻及改善临床结局的目的。
sentences.sentence_en: Therefore, on the basis of restricting total energy, regardless of how the macronutrients are proportioned, the goal of weight loss and improved clinical outcomes can be achieved.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 2. Dietary intervention and PCOS: (1) Restricting total energy intake: CRD should be the first choice for overweight and obese PCOS patients when losing weight. Randomized controlled trials have shown that CRD can improve the metabolic and hormone levels of obese PCOS women. Reducing the total energy of the daily diet by 500-1000 kcal means reducing the original body weight by 7%-10% in 6-12 months. (2) Selection of macronutrients and glycemic index: Domestic and foreign studies have shown that on the basis of restricting total energy, a high-protein/low-carbohydrate diet (protein 30%, carbohydrate 40%, fat 30%, MHCD) and a low-protein/high-carbohydrate diet (protein 15%, carbohydrate 55%, fat 30%, CHCD) can reduce body weight and androgen levels. MHCD significantly increases insulin sensitivity, reduces hyperinsulinemia and then reduces insulin resistance. A low-glycemic index diet can also improve hirsutism and acne by reducing insulin and testosterone levels in PCOS patients (regardless of whether they are obese). Therefore, on the basis of restricting total energy, regardless of how the macronutrients are matched, weight loss and improved clinical outcomes can be achieved.

paragraphs.paragraph: 在限制总能量、减轻体重的前提下，宏量营养素比例和质量选择对PCOS患者的生育、代谢、心理的影响存在着细微差别。低碳水化合物或低血糖指数饮食可更明显降低胰岛素抵抗、纤维蛋白原、总胆固醇和高密度脂蛋白胆固醇，低血糖指数饮食明显改善月经周期和生活质量，高蛋白膳食可明显改善抑郁和增强自尊；反之，高碳水化合物饮食明显增加游离睾酮指数。有研究显示，肥胖PCOS患者使用限能量代餐可降低患者BMI，改善代谢及激素指标，增加受孕几率。

sentences.sentence: 在限制总能量、减轻体重的前提下，宏量营养素比例和质量选择对PCOS患者的生育、代谢、心理的影响存在着细微差别。低碳水化合物或低血糖指数饮食可更明显降低胰岛素抵抗、纤维蛋白原、总胆固醇和高密度脂蛋白胆固醇，低血糖指数饮食明显改善月经周期和生活质量，高蛋白膳食可明显改善抑郁和增强自尊；反之，高碳水化合物饮食明显增加游离睾酮指数。有研究显示，肥胖PCOS患者使用限能量代餐可降低患者BMI，改善代谢及激素指标，增加受孕几率。
sentences.sentence_en: Under the premise of limiting total energy and reducing weight, there are subtle differences in the effects of macronutrient ratio and quality selection on the fertility, metabolism, and psychology of PCOS patients. A low-carbohydrate or low-glycemic index diet can more significantly reduce insulin resistance, fibrinogen, total cholesterol, and high-density lipoprotein cholesterol. A low-glycemic index diet can significantly improve menstrual cycles and quality of life. A high-protein diet can significantly improve depression and enhance self-esteem; conversely, a high-carbohydrate diet significantly increases the free testosterone index. Studies have shown that obese PCOS patients can use energy-restricted meal replacements to reduce their BMI, improve metabolic and hormonal indicators, and increase the chance of pregnancy.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: Under the premise of limiting total energy and reducing weight, there are subtle differences in the effects of macronutrient ratio and quality selection on the fertility, metabolism, and psychology of PCOS patients. A low-carbohydrate or low-glycemic index diet can more significantly reduce insulin resistance, fibrinogen, total cholesterol, and high-density lipoprotein cholesterol. A low-glycemic index diet can significantly improve menstrual cycles and quality of life. A high-protein diet can significantly improve depression and enhance self-esteem; conversely, a high-carbohydrate diet significantly increases the free testosterone index. Studies have shown that obese PCOS patients can use energy-restricted meal replacements to reduce their BMI, improve metabolic and hormonal indicators, and increase the chance of pregnancy.

paragraphs.paragraph: 3.综合管理：超重/肥胖PCOS的综合管理应包括持续的社会、家庭支持和教育，个体化方案、密切随访、医师监督以及医师、家庭、配偶和同事的支持都会促进体重达标与维持。PCOS患者记录饮食运动日记有利于长期坚持，以减轻体重并维持长期疗效。强化运动管理可降低并维持体重、改善心血管危险因素，且可改善排卵及胰岛素感性。国内研究显示，超重及肥胖的PCOS患者采用饮食联合运动治疗，可改善其内分泌激素及糖脂代谢紊乱。

sentences.sentence: 3.综合管理：超重/肥胖PCOS的综合管理应包括持续的社会、家庭支持和教育，个体化方案、密切随访、医师监督以及医师、家庭、配偶和同事的支持都会促进体重达标与维持。PCOS患者记录饮食运动日记有利于长期坚持，以减轻体重并维持长期疗效。强化运动管理可降低并维持体重、改善心血管危险因素，且可改善排卵及胰岛素感性。国内研究显示，超重及肥胖的PCOS患者采用饮食联合运动治疗，可改善其内分泌激素及糖脂代谢紊乱。
sentences.sentence_en: 3. Comprehensive management: The comprehensive management of overweight/obese PCOS should include continuous social and family support and education. Individualized plans, close follow-up, physician supervision, and support from physicians, families, spouses, and colleagues will promote achieving and maintaining weight goals. It is beneficial for PCOS patients to keep a diet and exercise diary in order to lose weight and maintain long-term efficacy. Intensive exercise management can reduce and maintain weight, improve cardiovascular risk factors, and improve ovulation and insulin sensitivity. Domestic studies have shown that overweight and obese PCOS patients can improve their endocrine hormone and glucose and lipid metabolism disorders by using a combination of diet and exercise.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 3. Comprehensive management: The comprehensive management of overweight/obese PCOS should include continuous social and family support and education. Individualized plans, close follow-up, physician supervision, and support from physicians, families, spouses, and colleagues will all promote achieving and maintaining weight goals. It is beneficial for PCOS patients to keep a diet and exercise diary in order to lose weight and maintain long-term efficacy. Intensive exercise management can reduce and maintain weight, improve cardiovascular risk factors, and improve ovulation and insulin sensitivity. Domestic studies have shown that overweight and obese PCOS patients can improve their endocrine hormone and glucose and lipid metabolism disorders by using a combination of diet and exercise.

paragraphs.paragraph: 四、超重/肥胖者合并代谢综合征的体重管理

sentences.sentence: 四、超重/肥胖者合并代谢综合征的体重管理
sentences.sentence_en: 4. Weight management for overweight/obese people with metabolic syndrome

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 4. Weight management for overweight/obese people with metabolic syndrome

paragraphs.paragraph: （一）背景

sentences.sentence: （一）背景
sentences.sentence_en: 1. Background

paragraphs.paragraph_en: 1. Background

paragraphs.paragraph: 代谢综合征是以超重/肥胖为中心并伴有一系列代谢紊乱的病症。随着社会生活水平的提高，以及国人膳食模式的变化，代谢综合征的流行呈现快速上升趋势，2000年至2001年的全国性横断面调查显示，男性和女性代谢综合征的惠病车分别为10.0%和23.3%。2011年美国Joslin糖尿病中心发布了合并糖尿病的肥胖患者临床营养指南，整部指南的目标人群实际是代谢综合征患者，其将体重管理置于营养管理的首要目标。与此同时，该指南还提出将膳食管理与胰岛素治疗相配合，同时需要考虑与营养有关的代谢并发症的控制。

sentences.sentence: 代谢综合征是以超重/肥胖为中心并伴有一系列代谢紊乱的病症。
sentences.sentence_en: Metabolic syndrome is a disease centered on overweight/obesity and accompanied by a series of metabolic disorders.

sentences.sentence: 随着社会生活水平的提高，以及国人膳食模式的变化，代谢综合征的流行呈现快速上升趋势，2000年至2001年的全国性横断面调查显示，男性和女性代谢综合征的惠病车分别为10.0%和23.3%。2011年美国Joslin糖尿病中心发布了合并糖尿病的肥胖患者临床营养指南，整部指南的目标人群实际是代谢综合征患者，其将体重管理置于营养管理的首要目标。与此同时，该指南还提出将膳食管理与胰岛素治疗相配合，同时需要考虑与营养有关的代谢并发症的控制。
sentences.sentence_en: With the improvement of social living standards and the change of Chinese people's dietary patterns, the prevalence of metabolic syndrome has shown a rapid upward trend. A national cross-sectional survey from 2000 to 2001 showed that the prevalence of metabolic syndrome in men and women was 10.0% and 23.3%, respectively. In 2011, the Joslin Diabetes Center in the United States issued a clinical nutrition guideline for obese patients with diabetes. The target population of the entire guideline is actually patients with metabolic syndrome, and it puts weight management at the top of the nutritional management goal. At the same time, the guideline also proposes to coordinate dietary management with insulin therapy, and at the same time, it is necessary to consider the control of metabolic complications related to nutrition.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: Metabolic syndrome is a disease centered on overweight/obesity and accompanied by a series of metabolic disorders. With the improvement of social living standards and changes in the dietary patterns of Chinese people, the prevalence of metabolic syndrome has shown a rapid upward trend. A national cross-sectional survey from 2000 to 2001 showed that the prevalence of metabolic syndrome in men and women was 10.0% and 23.3%, respectively. In 2011, the Joslin Diabetes Center in the United States issued clinical nutrition guidelines for obese patients with diabetes. The target population of the entire guideline is actually patients with metabolic syndrome, and it puts weight management at the primary goal of nutritional management. At the same time, the guideline also proposes to coordinate dietary management with insulin therapy, and it is necessary to consider the control of metabolic complications related to nutrition.

paragraphs.paragraph: (二)证据

sentences.sentence: (二)证据
sentences.sentence_en: (II) Evidence

paragraphs.paragraph_en: (II) Evidence

paragraphs.paragraph: 20世纪80年代，Vertes等对519例门诊患者进行断食治疗，78%的患者体重下降超过18.2kg，总体减重为每周1.5kg，女性平均每周减重1.3kg，男性每周减重2.1kg，大多数均能接受该方案而无任何严重副作用。一项基于16例肥胖患者的研究显示，在隔日断食法干预8周后，患者体重平均下降(5.6±1.0)kg，腰围平均缩小4.0cm，体脂含量从原来的(45±2)%降到(42±2)%，收缩压由(124±5)mmHg(1mmHg=0.133kPa)降到(116±3)mmHg，总胆固醇、低密度脂蛋白胆固醇和甘油三酯浓度也分别下降(21±4)%、(25±10)%和(32±6)%，而高密度脂蛋白胆固醇水平无变化。Johnson等的研究也发现，在隔日断食法干预8周后，肥胖患者的BMI较基线值下降8%，而低密度脂蛋白胆固醇和甘油三酯分别下降10%和40%。2013年发表的一项基于115例肥胖女性的研究显示，干预3个月后，两日断食法的肥胖患者体重平均下降4kg，而传统能量限制的肥胖患者体重平均下降2.4kg，且前者胰岛素抵抗改善更明显。2014年一项关于2型糖尿病预防的Meta分析发现轻断食可有效减重及预防2型糖尿病，对超重和肥胖患者的血糖、胰岛素及低密度脂蛋白胆固醇、高密度脂蛋白胆固醇等代谢标记物均有改善。

sentences.sentence: 20世纪80年代，Vertes等对519例门诊患者进行断食治疗，78%的患者体重下降超过18.2kg，总体减重为每周1.5kg，女性平均每周减重1.3kg，男性每周减重2.1kg，大多数均能接受该方案而无任何严重副作用。一项基于16例肥胖患者的研究显示，在隔日断食法干预8周后，患者体重平均下降(5.6±1.0)kg，腰围平均缩小4.0cm，体脂含量从原来的(45±2)%降到(42±2)%，收缩压由(124±5)mmHg(1mmHg=0.133kPa)降到(116±3)mmHg，总胆固醇、低密度脂蛋白胆固醇和甘油三酯浓度也分别下降(21±4)%、(25±10)%和(32±6)%，而高密度脂蛋白胆固醇水平无变化。Johnson等的研究也发现，在隔日断食法干预8周后，肥胖患者的BMI较基线值下降8%，而低密度脂蛋白胆固醇和甘油三酯分别下降10%和40%。2013年发表的一项基于115例肥胖女性的研究显示，干预3个月后，两日断食法的肥胖患者体重平均下降4kg，而传统能量限制的肥胖患者体重平均下降2.4kg，且前者胰岛素抵抗改善更明显。2014年一项关于2型糖尿病预防的Meta分析发现轻断食可有效减重及预防2型糖尿病，对超重和肥胖患者的血糖、胰岛素及低密度脂蛋白胆固醇、高密度脂蛋白胆固醇等代谢标记物均有改善。
sentences.sentence_en: In the 1980s, Vertes et al. conducted fasting treatment on 519 outpatients. 78% of the patients lost more than 18.2 kg, with an overall weight loss of 1.5 kg per week. Women lost an average of 1.3 kg per week, and men lost 2.1 kg per week. Most patients were able to accept the regimen without any serious side effects. A study based on 16 obese patients showed that after 8 weeks of alternate-day fasting intervention, the average weight of the patients decreased by (5.6±1.0) kg, the average waist circumference decreased by 4.0 cm, the body fat content decreased from the original (45±2)% to (42±2)%, the systolic blood pressure decreased from (124±5) mmHg (1 mmHg=0.133 kPa) to (116±3) mmHg, and the total cholesterol, low-density lipoprotein cholesterol and triglyceride concentrations also decreased by (21±4)%, (25±10)% and (32±6)%, respectively, while the high-density lipoprotein cholesterol level did not change. Johnson et al. also found that after 8 weeks of alternate-day fasting intervention, the BMI of obese patients decreased by 8% compared with the baseline value, while low-density lipoprotein cholesterol and triglycerides decreased by 10% and 40%, respectively. A study based on 115 obese women published in 2013 showed that after 3 months of intervention, the average weight loss of obese patients using the two-day fasting method was 4kg, while the average weight loss of obese patients using traditional energy restriction was 2.4kg, and the former had more obvious improvement in insulin resistance. A 2014 meta-analysis on the prevention of type 2 diabetes found that intermittent fasting can effectively reduce weight and prevent type 2 diabetes, and improves metabolic markers such as blood sugar, insulin, low-density lipoprotein cholesterol, and high-density lipoprotein cholesterol in overweight and obese patients.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: In the 1980s, Vertes et al. conducted fasting treatment on 519 outpatients. 78% of the patients lost more than 18.2 kg, with an overall weight loss of 1.5 kg per week. Women lost an average of 1.3 kg per week, and men lost 2.1 kg per week. Most patients were able to accept the regimen without any serious side effects. A study based on 16 obese patients showed that after 8 weeks of alternate-day fasting intervention, the average weight of the patients decreased by (5.6±1.0) kg, the average waist circumference decreased by 4.0 cm, the body fat content decreased from the original (45±2)% to (42±2)%, the systolic blood pressure decreased from (124±5) mmHg (1 mmHg=0.133 kPa) to (116±3) mmHg, and the total cholesterol, low-density lipoprotein cholesterol and triglyceride concentrations also decreased by (21±4)%, (25±10)% and (32±6)%, respectively, while the high-density lipoprotein cholesterol level did not change. Johnson et al. also found that after 8 weeks of alternate-day fasting intervention, the BMI of obese patients decreased by 8% compared with the baseline value, while low-density lipoprotein cholesterol and triglycerides decreased by 10% and 40%, respectively. A study based on 115 obese women published in 2013 showed that after 3 months of intervention, the average weight loss of obese patients using the two-day fasting method was 4kg, while the average weight loss of obese patients using traditional energy restriction was 2.4kg, and the former had more obvious improvement in insulin resistance. A 2014 meta-analysis on the prevention of type 2 diabetes found that intermittent fasting can effectively reduce weight and prevent type 2 diabetes, and improves metabolic markers such as blood sugar, insulin, low-density lipoprotein cholesterol, and high-density lipoprotein cholesterol in overweight and obese patients.

paragraphs.paragraph: 对于合并代谢综合征的肥胖患者，临床证据中较为一致的将生活行为方式干预作为减重和改善代谢紊乱的基础治疗措施。同时，对于各种膳食模式的比较发现，在控制总能量摄入的前提下，它们的总体效果相似。需要指出的是，目前的研究样本量均不大，且干预时间较短(12~24周)，尚欠缺长时间干预的研究证据。2015年，澳大利亚启动了一项针对中老年(50~69岁)MS患者的大样本(500例)减重干预研究，旨在检验综合性行为、营养和心理干预的影响，或将在未来几年得出一些有指导意义的结论。

sentences.sentence: 对于合并代谢综合征的肥胖患者，临床证据中较为一致的将生活行为方式干预作为减重和改善代谢紊乱的基础治疗措施。同时，对于各种膳食模式的比较发现，在控制总能量摄入的前提下，它们的总体效果相似。需要指出的是，目前的研究样本量均不大，且干预时间较短(12~24周)，尚欠缺长时间干预的研究证据。
sentences.sentence_en: For obese patients with metabolic syndrome, clinical evidence consistently uses lifestyle intervention as a basic treatment measure for weight loss and improvement of metabolic disorders. At the same time, a comparison of various dietary patterns found that their overall effects were similar under the premise of controlling total energy intake. It should be pointed out that the sample size of current studies is not large, and the intervention time is short (12 to 24 weeks), and there is still a lack of research evidence for long-term intervention.

sentences.sentence: 2015年，澳大利亚启动了一项针对中老年(50~69岁)MS患者的大样本(500例)减重干预研究，旨在检验综合性行为、营养和心理干预的影响，或将在未来几年得出一些有指导意义的结论。
sentences.sentence_en: In 2015, Australia launched a large-sample (500 cases) weight loss intervention study for middle-aged and elderly (50-69 years old) MS patients, aiming to examine the effects of comprehensive behavioral, nutritional and psychological interventions, which may lead to some guiding conclusions in the next few years.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: For obese patients with metabolic syndrome, clinical evidence has consistently used lifestyle intervention as a basic treatment measure for weight loss and improvement of metabolic disorders. At the same time, a comparison of various dietary patterns found that their overall effects were similar under the premise of controlling total energy intake. It should be pointed out that the current research sample size is not large, and the intervention time is short (12 to 24 weeks), and there is still a lack of research evidence for long-term intervention. In 2015, Australia launched a large sample (500 cases) weight loss intervention study for middle-aged and elderly (50 to 69 years old) MS patients, aiming to test the effects of comprehensive behavioral, nutritional and psychological interventions, and may draw some guiding conclusions in the next few years.

paragraphs.paragraph: 英国国家卫生与临床优化研究所(NICE)指南认为肥胖管理包括节食、运动、行为改变，且需要长期随访并推荐低脂、高纤维饮食，增加体力活动，避免久坐，规律监测体重和腰围变化。

sentences.sentence: 英国国家卫生与临床优化研究所(NICE)指南认为肥胖管理包括节食、运动、行为改变，且需要长期随访并推荐低脂、高纤维饮食，增加体力活动，避免久坐，规律监测体重和腰围变化。
sentences.sentence_en: The guidelines of the National Institute for Health and Care Excellence (NICE) in the UK believe that obesity management includes diet, exercise, and behavior change, and requires long-term follow-up and recommends a low-fat, high-fiber diet, increased physical activity, avoiding sitting for long periods of time, and regular monitoring of changes in weight and waist circumference.

paragraphs.paragraph_en: The guidelines of the National Institute for Health and Care Excellence (NICE) in the UK believe that obesity management includes diet, exercise, and behavior change, and requires long-term follow-up and recommends a low-fat, high-fiber diet, increased physical activity, avoiding sitting for long periods of time, and regular monitoring of changes in weight and waist circumference.
